src_text: building a nation that cares for children vukuzenzele unnamed there is a proverb common to many african cultures which says that it takes a village to raise a child.
tgt_text: u fhaṱa lushaka lu ṱhogomelaho vhana u fhaṱa lushaka lu ṱhogomelaho vhana vukuzenzele unnamed hu na murero wo ḓoweleaho kha mvelele nnzhi dza vhathu vha afrika une wa ri zwi dzhia muvhu ndu woṱhe u alusa ṅwana.

src_text: this idea – that the broader community has a responsibility for the development, wellbeing and safety of each child – comes to mind when i think about the tragic and deeply upsetting death of 13yearold enock mpianzi on a school camp recently.
tgt_text: muhumbulo uyu – wa uri vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha u bveledzisa, vhuvha na tsire ledzo ya ṅwana muṅwe na muṅwe – murero uyu u a ḓa musi ndi tshi humbula nga ha ḽikhaulambilu na lufu lu vhaisaho zwihulu lwa enock mpianzi wa vhukale ha miṅwaha ya 13 lwo iteaho zwezwino khempheni ya tshikolo.

src_text: sadly, enock is not the only child to lose his life for reasons that were entirely preventable, if only adults had exercised due care and responsibility.
tgt_text: zwi vhaisaho ndi zwauri, enock a si ene ṅwana e eṱhe we a xelelwa nga vhutshilo nga zwiitisi zwine zwa vhukuma zwa nga thivhelea, arali vhathu vhahulwane vho vha vho ṋe tshedza ndondolo na vhuḓifhi nduleli.

src_text: one thinks of another 13yearold, keamohetswe shaun seboko, who recently drowned in the swimming pool of a magaliesburg primary school, and the two children who died at the lekgolo primary school in limpopo when a truck crashed into a wall that collapsed on them.
tgt_text: muthu u a dovha hafhu a humbula nga ha muṅwe wa vhukale ha miṅwaha ya 13, keamohetswe shaun seboko, we a nwela khothe zwenezwino damuni ḽa u bambela ḽa tshikolo tsha phuraimari tsha magalie sburg, na vhana vhavhili vhe vha lovha tshikoloni tsha phuraimari tsha lekgolo ngei limpopo musi ṱiraka ḽi tshi zhaka luvhondo lwa vha wela.

src_text: one thinks also about the many children, like 6yearold nathlia pienaar, who are killed in the crossfire of gang wars on the cape flats.
tgt_text: muthu u a dovha a humbula hafhu nga ha vhana vhanzhi, sa nathlia pienaar wa vhukale ha miṅwaha ya 6, vhane vha khou vhulawa kha nndwa dza magevhenga ngei fuletheni dza kapa.

src_text: we remember also the tragic deaths of michael komape and lumka mkethwa, both of whom died after falling into pit latrines.
tgt_text: ri humbula hafhu mpfu dzi khaulaho mbilu dza michael komape na lumka mkethwa, vhuvhili havho vho lovha musi vho wela kha mabunga a dindi.

src_text: all of those young lives, and the lives of many others, need never have been lost.
tgt_text: matshilo oṱhe ayo a vhathu vhaṱuku, na matshilo a vhaṅwe vhanzhi, o vha a tshi ḓo vha a songo ṱuwa.

src_text: all these tragedies could have been prevented if measures had been taken to keep these children out of harm’s way.
tgt_text: makhaula mbilu haya oṱhe o vha a tshi ḓo vha o thivhelea arali ho vha na maga o dzhiwaho a u tsireledza vhana kha fhethu hu huvhadzaho.

src_text: it seems to me that, as a society, we are failing our children.
tgt_text: zwi ntsumbedza uri, sa lushaka, ri khou laṱedza vhana vhashu.

src_text: too many children find themselves in dangerous situations, whether it is on a make shift raft on a river or being left alone in a shack with a paraffin lamp.
tgt_text: vhana vhanzhi vha ḓiwana vhe kha nyimele dzi ofhisaho, kana tshikhwekhwethe tsha tshifhinganyana mulamboni kana u vha sia vha vhoṱhe mukhukhuni hu na lammba ḽa pharafeni.

src_text: when contractors leave excavations unprotected or school infrastructure is not maintained or school transport is overcrowded, the lives of children are put at risk.
tgt_text: musi vhorakhonhṱiraka vha tshi sia mitshini i songo tsireledzea kana themamvele dziso dza tshikolo dzi sa khou londotwa kana tshiendedzi tsha u ya tshikoloni tsho ḓala lu kalulaho, matshilo a vhana a vha o vhewa kha khombo.

src_text: but there is more than negligence and neglect at work.
tgt_text: fhedzi hu na zwinzhi u fhirisa u sa vha na ndavha na u sokou litshedzela mushumo.

src_text: many children are targeted by sexual predators, criminal gangs and drug sellers precisely because they are vulnerable.
tgt_text: vhana vhanzhi ndi zwipondwa zwa vhabtzipi, magevhenga na vharengisi vha zwidzidzivhadzi nga maanḓa ngauri a vha koni u ḓitsireledza.

src_text: as a society, we need to be more diligent and more active in protecting our children from these and other dangers.
tgt_text: sa lushaka, ri tea u vha na vhuronwane na u ṱalifha vhukuma kha zwa u tsireledza vhana vhashu kha khombo idzi na dziṅwe.

src_text: as a society, we need to build a culture of responsibility.
tgt_text: sa lushaka, ri tea u fhaṱa mvelele ya vhuḓifhinduleli.

src_text: we need to be responsible for ourselves, for our children and for others.
tgt_text: ri tea u vha na vhuḓifhinduleli kha riṋe vhaṋe, kha vhana vhashu na kha vhaṅwe.

src_text: just as we need to ensure that children are able to grow up in a safe, nurturing and stimulating environment, so too must we feel a duty to protect and care for all those who we know and interact with.
tgt_text: musi ri tshi ṱoḓa u vhona uri vhana vha khou kona u aluwa kha vhupo vhu na ṱhuṱhuwedzo, ndondolo na tsireledzo, zwo ralo ri tea u pfa zwi mushumo washu u tsireledza na u londota vhoṱhe vhane ra vha ḓivha na vhane ra tshilisana navho.

src_text: we must feel this duty of care on the road.
tgt_text: ri tea u pfa mushumo hoyu wa u londota na musi ri dzibadani.

src_text: while we welcome the drop in road fatalities over this festive season, the grim reality is that over 1,600 people died on our roads in just a month and a half.
tgt_text: musi ri tshi khou ṱanganedza phungudzeo kha khombo dza badani kha tshifhinga tsha madakalo, ngoho i shushaho ndi ya uri vhathu vha fhiraho 1,600 vho lovha dzibadani dzashu kha tshifhinga tsha ṅwedzi na hafu.

src_text: it is disturbing that over 9,000 motorists were arrested for offences including drunk driving, speeding, and reckless and negligent driving.
tgt_text: zwi a kula nungo zwauri vhareili vha fhiraho 9,000 vho farelwa vhutshinyi vhu katelaho u reila vho kambiwa, luvhilo, u reila nga u sa londa.

src_text: a culture of responsibility means that we should all drive safely and respect the rights of pedestrians and other road users.
tgt_text: mvelele ya vhuḓifhinduleli zwi amba uri roṱhe ri tea u reila nga vhuronwane na u ṱhonifha pfanelo dza vhaendangaṋayo na vhaṅwe vhashumisi vha bada.

src_text: a culture of responsibility means that fathers need to be present in the lives of their children.
tgt_text: mvelele ya vhuḓifhinduleli zwi amba uri vhokhotsi vha tea u vha hone kha matshilo a vhana vhavho.

src_text: too many women have to raise children on their own, which often limits their prospects and those of their children.
tgt_text: vhafumakadzi vhanzhi vha alusa vhana vhe vhoṱhe, zwine zwa anzela u fhungudza khonadzeo dzavho dza u bvelela na dza vhana vhavho.

src_text: a culture of responsibility also means that we should practice safe sex and not expose ourselves or others to hiv .
tgt_text: mvelele ya vhuḓifhinduleli zwi dovha hafhu zwa amba uri ri tea u ḓigudisa vhudzekani ho tsireledzeaho na u sa ḓiwedza kana u wedza vhaṅwe kha hiv .

src_text: we should not abuse alcohol or use drugs.
tgt_text: a ri tei u shumisa zwikambi kana zwidzidzivhadzi.

src_text: we should seek to live healthy lives so that we avoid diseases that are largely preventable and live longer lives.
tgt_text: ri tea u lusa u tshila ri na mutakalo u itela uri ri thivhele malwadze ane a tsireledzea na u tshila matshilo malapfu.

src_text: such a culture should be embraced in particular by all those in society who occupy positions of authority and influence, whether they are religious leaders or politicians, traditional leaders or celebrities.
tgt_text: mvelele iyi i tea u kutelwa nga maanḓa nga havho vhane kha lushaka vha fara maimo a maanḓalanga na vhuṱuṱuwedzi, kana vharangaphanḓa vha zwa vhurereli kana vhorapoḽotiki, vharangaphanḓa vha zwa mvelele kana vhaḓivhalea.

src_text: through their words and actions, they should seek to build a better society in which all are appreciated and cared for.
tgt_text: nga kha maipfi kana nyito dzavho, vha tea u lusa u fhaṱa lushaka lwa khwine lune vhoṱhe vha dzhielwa nṱha na u londotwa.

src_text: elected officials and public servants are entrusted with the responsibility to ensure the safety and wellbeing of citizens.
tgt_text: vhaofisiri vho khethwaho na vhashumeli vha muvhuso vho fhulufhelwa nga vhuḓifhinduleli ha u vhona tsireledzo na vhuvha ha vhadzulapo.

src_text: they must ensure that there is adequate and safe infrastructure in schools.
tgt_text: vha tea u vhona uri hu na themamveledziso dzo teaho zwikoloni.

src_text: they must act quickly when there is an interruption to water supply in a communities or when faulty streetlights are reported.
tgt_text: vha tea u dzhia maga nga u ṱavhanya musi hu na khakhathi ya nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha vhadzulapo kana musi mavhone a zwiṱaraṱani o tshi nyalaho o vhigiwa.

src_text: they must ensure that health and safety regulations are enforced and that the rule of law is maintained.
tgt_text: vha tea u vhona uri milayo ya vhutsirele dzi na mutakalo i khou tevhed zwa na uri mulayo u khou tevhedzwa.

src_text: in addition to the ongoing work that is taking place across government, at all levels, to give effect to this responsibility, we have sometimes had to take extraordinary measures.
tgt_text: ho sedzwa mushumo u no khou itwa kha muvhuso, kha masia oṱhe, u ita uri vhuḓifhi nduleli uhu vhu vhonale, tshiṅwe tshifhinga ri tea u dzhia maga mahulwane.

src_text: in response to the deaths and injury caused by children falling into pit latrines, we launched the safe initiative to accelerate the provision of appropriate toilets to all schools in the country.
tgt_text: u fhindula kha dzimpfu na mafuvhalo o vhangwaho musi vhana vha tshi wela kha mabunga a di ndi, ro rwela ṱari vhurangeli ha safe u tshimbidza ṋetshedzo ya mabunga o teaho kha zwikolo zwoṱhe kha shango.

src_text: we deployed the south african national defence force to parts of cape town to support the police in their efforts to reduce gang violence.
tgt_text: ro rumela mmbi ya vhupileli ya lushaka ya afrika tshipembe kha zwipiḓa zwa ḓorobo ya kapa u tikedza mapholisa kha ndingedzo dzavho dza u fhu ngudza khakhathi dzi itwaho nga magevhenga.

src_text: more recently, we have, together with civil society, embarked on an emergency response plan to end violence against women and children.
tgt_text: zwenezwino, ro ṱangana na vhashumeli vha muvhuso, ro ḓidzhenisa kha pulane ya u fhindula zwa shishi u itela u fhelisa khakhathi dzi ite lwaho vhafumakadzi na vhana.

src_text: yet, there is clearly much more that we need to do, as government and as a society.
tgt_text: naho zwo ralo, hu vhonala hu na zwinzhi zwine ra tea u ita, sa muvhuso nahone sa lushaka.

src_text: we applaud those individuals and organisations who have taken upon themselves responsibility for the wellbeing of others.
tgt_text: ri fhululedza madzangano na vhathu avho vhe vha vhea mahaḓani avho vhuḓifhinduleli ha vhuvha ha vhaṅwe vhathu.

src_text: there are people like ralph bouwers and mark nicholson, who organise recreation activities for young people in lavender hill in cape town to keep them from turning to gangsterism.
tgt_text: hu na vhathu vha ngaho sa vho ralph bouwers na vho mark nicholson, vhe vha dzudzanya mishumo ya vhuḓimvumvusi ha vhaswa ngei lavender hill kha ḽa ḓorobo ya kapa u vha tsireledza kha u shandukela kha zwa vhugevhenga.

src_text: there are the mothers, sisters and daughters who work as student volunteers with operation bobbi bear, an organisation in amanzimtoti in kwazulunatal that offers shelter to young children who have been abused.
tgt_text: hu na vhomme, dzikhaladzi na vhasidzanyana vhane vha shuma sa matshudeni vha sa shumeli malamba kha operation bobbi bear, dzangano ḽi re amanzimtoti ngei kwazulunatal ḽine ḽa ṋetshedza haya kha vhana vhaṱuku vhe vha tambudzwa.

src_text: there are many faithbased groups like the southern african catholic bishops’ confer ence, who i met recently who told me about the work they are doing to respond to the needs of the poor, to support families to be more caring and nurturing and to assist young people in confronting the many challenges before them.
tgt_text: hu na zwigwada zwo ḓisen dekaho nga zwa lutendo zwi ngaho sa khonferentsi ya mabishopho a khathyoḽiki tshipembe ha afrika, vhe nda ṱangana navho zwenezwino vhe vha mmbudza nga ha mushumo une vha khou ita u fhindula ṱhoḓea dza vhashayi, u tikedza miṱa uri i vhe i londaho na u ṱhogomela nga maanḓa na u thusa vhaswa musi vha tshi livhana na khaedu nnzhi dzi re phanḓa havho.

src_text: these south africans are showing us the way.
tgt_text: vhathu avha vha afrika tshipembe vha khou ri sumbedza nḓila.

src_text: through their example, they are reminding us of what it means to take responsibility for ourselves and for others.
tgt_text: nga kha tsumbo dzavho, vha khou ri humbudza zwauri zwi amba mini u dzhia vhuḓifhinduleli hashu riṋe vhaṋe na ha vhaṅwe.

src_text: this country has witnessed far too many tragedies.
tgt_text: shango iḽi ḽo no ṱanzilela makhaulambilu manzhi vhukuma.

src_text: too many young lives have been lost, too many children hurt and traumatised.
tgt_text: matshilo manzhi a vhathu vhaṱuku o lozwea, vhana vha nzhi vho vhaisala na u thithisea muhumbulo.

src_text: we can bring these tragedies to an end if we all, each one of us, take responsibility for raising the children in our great south african village.
tgt_text: u fhaṱa lushaka lu ṱhogomelaho vhana u fhaṱa lushaka lu ṱhogomelaho vhana vukuzenzele unnamed hu na murero wo ḓoweleaho kha mvelele nnzhi dza vhathu vha afrika une wa ri zwi dzhia muvhu ndu woṱhe u alusa ṅwana.

src_text: the ins and outs of adhd and add silusapho nyanda there is help available for children who suffer from attention deficit and hyperactivity disorders.
tgt_text: mafhungo nga vhuḓalo nga ha adhd na add silusapho nyanda hu na thuso ine ya vha hone kha vhana vhane vha konḓelwa u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi, u vha na mafufulu o kalulaho na u sa dzulisea arali ṅwana ane a vha na thaidzo ya u konḓelwa u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi, u sa dzulisea na u vha na mafulufulu o kalulaho (adhd) kana u a konḓelwa u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi na u sa dzulisea (add) a sa ilafhiwa, nyimele idzo dzi nga vha na masiandaitwa a tshifhinga tshilapfu kha mutakalo wawe.

src_text: the brains of preschool children grow at an incredible rate and help lay the foundations of language, thinking and social and emotional development.
tgt_text: hezwi ndi u ya nga dokotela vho khatija jhazbhay, vhane vha rangaphanḓa yuniti ya zwa muhumbulo ya vhaswa na vhana ngei sibadela tsha townhill pietermaritzburg, ngei kwazulunatal.

src_text: children from upington in the northern cape are benefiting from 10 early childhood development (ecds) centres recently launched by the department of social develop ment (dsd).
tgt_text: vho ṱalutshedza uri vho no aluwa, vhana avha vha nga vha kha khombo khulwane ya dziṅwe nyimele dza muhu mbulo, dzi nga ho sa mbilaelo na mutsiko, nahone vha nga shumisa zwikambi lu si lwavhudi.

src_text: fiveyearold lithemba bacela, who lives with cerebral palsy and has a speech impairment, is better able to indicate what she feels and needs, thanks to her time at one of these centres, oasis skills development centre’s ecd unit.
tgt_text: adhd na add vhu kwama mvelaphanḓa dza pfunzo dza vhana nahone maitele avho a nga kwatisa vhaṅwe.

src_text: lithemba lives in paballelo with her mother, elizabeth bacela, who says her child’s communication skills have improved since she started at the centre last year.
tgt_text: vhana na vhone vha nga nyaliwa, vha dzhena khakhathini na u welwa nga dzikhombo.

src_text: elizabeth said the stimulation area has been particularly beneficial.
tgt_text: dokotela vho jhazbhay vho amba uri: "nyimele dza ṅwana muṅwe na muṅwe dzi a aluwa nahone a dzi fani, zwo ralo ndi zwa ndeme u ita ṱhaṱhuvho ya kiḽinikhaḽa yo ṱanḓavhuwaho u vhona zwiṅwe zwithu zwine zwa nga vha zwi tshi kwama mveledziso dzavho, khathihi na zwa ndeme zwine zwa nga itwa u vha thusa u swikela hune vha tea u swikela vhukoni havho ho fhelelaho.

src_text: "lithemba can now indicate when she is thirsty, hungry or has wet herself.
tgt_text: "vho ṱalutshedza uri adhd na add ndi thithiso ya nyaluwo ya maluvhi ine ya sumbedziswa nga vhuḓifari vhu si havhuḓi, zwi ngaho sa u sa kona u dzu lisea na u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi.

src_text: "the oasis ecd centre is one of 10 that received new buildings from the national lotteries commission (nlc) as part of the commission’s legacy project.
tgt_text: izwi zwi vhonala nga: u ita vhukhakhi vhu sa tei u itwa u sa fhedza mishumo u xedza zwithu u khakhisea na u hangwa nga u ṱavhanyatsumbo dza u sa dzulisea na u vha na mafulufulu o kalulaho kana u sa langea zwi katela: mazhuluzhulu u tambisa zwanḓa kana milenzhe u swenda swenda kha tshidulo u sokou fhindula u songo thoma wa humbula na u sokou takuwa wa ima u tshi khou lavhelelwa u dzula.

src_text: this countrywide initiative is aligned with the national development plan’s commitment to improving education, innovation and training, and ensuring that all children have at least two years of preschool education.
tgt_text: "tsumbadwadze dzi vhonala fhethu huvhili kana u fhira – hayani, tshikoloni, u na khonani kana mashaka kana musi hu na miṅwe mishumo – zwa thithisa mashumele a tshikolo, zwa mushumo kana zwa matshilisano.

src_text: the centre accommodates children who live with a variety of conditions, including autism, down syndrome, cerebral palsy and foetal alcohol syndrome.
tgt_text: tsumbadwadze dzo kalula ho dzi vhonala ṅwana a sa athu swika miṅwaha ya 12 nahone zwi tea u vhonala lwa miṅwedzi ya henefha kha ya rathi.

src_text: each of the four classes at the ecd centre has 10 to 15 pupils, says acting chairperson of oasis skills development centre marina johannesen.
tgt_text: vhadededzi vha a kona u topola vhuḓifari vhu siho kha ngona nahone vha nga isa ṅwana kha ṱhaṱhuvho ya zwa kiḽinikhaḽa.

src_text: the department contributes a subsidy of r20 per child, which covers children between the ages of two and seven and those who are 18 years of age and above.
tgt_text: mafhungo nga vhuḓalo nga ha adhd na add silusapho nyanda hu na thuso ine ya vha hone kha vhana vhane vha konḓelwa u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi, u vha na mafufulu o kalulaho na u sa dzulisea arali ṅwana ane a vha na thaidzo ya u konḓelwa u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi, u sa dzulisea na u vha na mafulufulu o kalulaho (adhd) kana u a konḓelwa u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi na u sa dzulisea (add) a sa ilafhiwa, nyimele idzo dzi nga vha na masiandaitwa a tshifhinga tshilapfu kha mutakalo wawe.

src_text: young people are sa's real jewels vukuzenzele unnamed engaging with young people always leaves me energised.
tgt_text: vhaswa ndi vhone vhumatshelo ha shango ḽashu vukuzenzele unnamed u ambedzana na vha swa zwi anzela u ntsia ndi na mafulufulu.

src_text: it is exciting to gain insight into their struggles and triumphs and their vision for what can be done to improve this country.
tgt_text: zwi a takadza u wana luvhonela nga ha thambulo na madakalo avho na bono ḽavho ḽa uri hu nga itwa mini u khwi nisa shango iḽi.

src_text: there is no denying that youth are a significant presence in our nation’s psyche and fabric.
tgt_text: a zwi hanedzwi uri vhaswa ndi vhuhone ha ndeme kha muya na muhanga wa lushaka.

src_text: far from the perception that they are complacent, politically apathetic or selfabsorbed, local and international studies consistently affirm that young people around the globe are always more positive about their prospects.
tgt_text: kule na kuhumbulele kwa uri vha ṱoḓa u ḓitakadza fhedzi, u sa ḓidzhenisa kha zwa poḽotiki kana u humbulela vhone vhaṋe, ngudo dzapo na dza dzitshaka dzi anzela u khwaṱhisedza uri vhaswa u mona na ḽifhasi vha anzela u vha na fulufhelo nga ha ndavhelelo dzavho.

src_text: according to the findings of an ipsos pulse of the people poll released in january, 61% of south africans aged 15 to 17 feel optimistic about 2020. i have no doubt this is a sentiment shared by youth in general and especially the cohort born at the turn of the millennium who are now beginning their adult life, the ones the youth call ama2000.
tgt_text: u ya nga mawanwa a ipsos pulse a khetho dza vhathu o bviswaho nga phando, 61% ya maafrika tshipembe vha miṅwaha u bva kha 15 u ya kha 17 vha pfa vha na fulufhelo nga ha 2020. a thi timatimi uri hovhu ndi vhuḓipfi ha vhaswa nga u anga redza nga maanḓa avho vho bebiwaho nga tshifhinga tshi fanaho tsha musi miḽeniamu i tshi khou shanduka vhane zwa zwino vha khou thoma vhutshilo ha vhaaluwa, vhane vhaswa vha vha vhidza ama2000.

src_text: they are the sons and daughters born after democracy.
tgt_text: ndi vharwa na vhananyana vho bebwaho nga murahu ha dimokirasi.

src_text: while they have no direct experience of the atrocities of apartheid, they continue to live with its legacy of racial inequity, spatial injustice and poverty.
tgt_text: musi vha songo ṱangana na tshenzhemo thwii ya tshiṱuhu tsha muvhuso wa tshiṱalula, vha bvela phanḓa na u tshila na vhufa hawo ha tshayandingano ya muvhala, u sa dzula hu fanaho na vhushai.

src_text: these young people are confident, selfassured and brimming with ambition.
tgt_text: vhaswa avha vha na fulufhelo, vhuḓifulufheli na u fhufhuma lutamo lwa u bvelela.

src_text: they know their rights and aren’t afraid to demand them.
tgt_text: vha a ḓivha pfanelo dzavho nahone a vha shavhi u dzi ṱoḓa.

src_text: our country’s youth represent energy, hope, fun, poten tial, future and freedom.
tgt_text: vhaswa vha shango vha imela mafulufulu, fulufhelo, vhuḓi mvumvusi, vhukoni, vhuma tshelo na mbofholowo.

src_text: they are digital natives fluent in the use of modern technologies and look to enter careers that did not even exist at the time of their parents.
tgt_text: vho bebwa nga tshifhinga tsha thekhinoḽodzhi ya didzhithala na u kona zwavhuḓi kushumisele kwa thekhinoḽodzhi dza tshizwinozwino na u ṱoḓa u dzhena kha mabuḓo e a vha a siho na luthi hi nga tshifhinga tsha vhabebi vhavho.

src_text: on the eve of the state of the nation address i had the privilege of interacting with a group of such dynamic young people at an intergenerational dialogue convened by the national youth development agency.
tgt_text: nga madekwana a ḓuvha ḽa phanḓa ha vhuṱambo ha mulaedza wa lushaka ndo vha na mashudu a u ambedzana na tshigwada tsha vhaswa vha mafulufulu kha nyambedzano dza mirafho yo vhalaho yo rambi waho nga zhendedzi ḽa mvele dziso ya vhaswa ḽa lushaka.

src_text: we discussed the issues that are most important to young people and examined ways in which we could align our perspectives and actions.
tgt_text: ro amba nga ha zwithu zwine zwa vha zwa vhuṱhogwa vhukuma kha vhaswa na u ṱola nḓila dzine ri nga livhanya kuhu mbulele na nyito dzashu.

src_text: naturally, access to employment and opportunities dominated the agenda.
tgt_text: sa nḓowelo, mafhungo nga ha u wana mishumo na zwikhala zwa mishumo zwo vha zwo a ndesa kha adzhenda.

src_text: of the 1.2 million young people entering the labour market each year, almost twothirds remain neither working nor studying.
tgt_text: kha vhaswa vha 1.2 miḽioni vhane vha khou dzhena kha makete wa vhashumi ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe, vhane vha ṱoḓa u lingana mbili tsha tshararu vha vha vha vha sa khou shuma kana u guda tshikoloni.

src_text: the participants in the dialogue welcomed the fact that the issue of youth employment was receiving attention at the highest levels of government.
tgt_text: vhadzheneli kha nyambedzano vho ṱanganedza zwa uri fhungo ḽa mushumo wa vhaswa ḽi khou sedzeswa khaḽo kha ḽevele dza nṱhesa dza muvhuso.

src_text: but the refrain was familiar: they were ready and able to contribute to the economy in various ways, including as entrepreneurs, but bureaucratic red tape and lack of funding prevents them from doing so.
tgt_text: fhedzi mbuelelo ndi i ḓivheaho: vho ḓiimisela na u ḓo u shela mule nzhe kha ikonomi nga nḓila dzo fhambanaho, hu tshi katelwa na vhoramabindu, fhedzi sisiṱeme ya ndaulo i konḓesaho na u sa vha hone ha ndambedzo ya masheleni zwi vha thivhela u ita nga u ralo.

src_text: as bright hlongwane from youth in business south africa told me, there needs to be more funding extended to young entrepreneurs.
tgt_text: sa zwe bright hlongwane u bva kha vhaswa vha re kha mabindu afrika tshipembe a mmbudza zwone, hu fanela u vha na ndambedzo ya masheleni ma nzhi a ṋetshedzwaho vhorama bindu vha vhaswa.

src_text: they would like to see a variety of financial institutions, developmental financial institutions, angel investors, private equity firms as well as commercial banks extending credit and taking a bet on young entrepreneurs.
tgt_text: vha tama u vhona tshaka dzo fhambanaho dza zwiimiswa zwa masheleni, zwiimiswa zwa masheleni a mveledziso, vhabindudzi vha phuraivethe, dzifeme dza miko vhe dza phuraivethe khathihi na dzibannga dza zwa mabindu vha tshi ṋetshedza tshikolodo na u betsha kha vhoramabindu vha vhaswa.

src_text: for our country to prosper and thrive we must do all within our means to ensure young people can participate in our economy in a meaningful way, whether it is in formal employment or selfemployment.
tgt_text: uri shango ḽashu ḽi bvelele ri fanela u lingedza nga nḓila dzoṱhe u khwaṱhisedza uri vhaswa vha khou kona u dzhenela kha ikonomi yashu nga nḓila i pfadzaho, hu nga vha nga nḓila ya mushumo wa fomaḽa kana nga u tou ḓishuma.

src_text: it was therefore fitting that i could use this platform to launch the presidential youth employment intervention, which is a strategic national vision and plan which sets out priority actions to address youth unemployment.
tgt_text: zwenezwo zwo vha zwo tea uri ndi nga shumisa luvhanḓe ulu u rwela ṱari vhudzheneleli kha zwa mishumo ya vhaswa ya ofisi ya muphuresidennde, ine ya vha bono ḽa maano a vhuṱali ḽa lushaka ḽine ḽa vhekanya nyito ya ndemesa ya u lwa na vhushayamushumo kha vhaswa.

src_text: this includes a national pathway management network that matches candidates with work opportunities.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi katela netiweke ya ndangulo ya gondo ḽa lushaka ine ya tshimbilelana na vhaṱoḓi vha mushumo na zwikhala zwa mushumo.

src_text: this will enable young people to have access to opportunities as some of them do not have the networks that make easy access to opportunities possible.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi ḓo konisa vhaswa u swikela zwikhala sa i zwi vhaṅwe vhavho vha si na netiweke dzine dza nga leludza uri zwi konadzee u swikela zwikhala.

src_text: specialised short focused courses in skills that employers need now will be organ ised.
tgt_text: khoso pfufhi dzo khetheaho dzo tou sedzesaho kha mushumo dza zwikili zwine vhatholi vha zwi ṱoḓa zwino dzi ḓo dzudzanywa.

src_text: this aims to address the problem of a mismatch between the existing educational, training and develop ment programmes and the requirements of the economy.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi khou itela u tandulula thaidzo ya u sa tshimbilelana vhukati ha mbekanyamushumo dza mveledziso na vhupfumbudzi na pfunzo dzine dza vha hone zwino zwi tshi vhambe dzwa na ṱhoḓea dza ikonomi.

src_text: we welcome the work already being done in this area, such as the programme currently underway through the departments of agriculture, land reform and rural development and cooperative governance and traditional affairs to train 1,000 young students in the free state in agricultural and other skills.
tgt_text: ri ṱanganedza mushumo wo no itwaho kha sia iḽi, u fana na mbekanyamushumo ine ya vha kati zwino nga kha mihasho ya zwa vhulimi, vhuvhusi ha tshumisano na zwa sialala, mveledziso ya mahayani na mvusuludzo ya mavu ya u pfumbudza matshudeni a vha swa a 1,000 ngei free state kha zwa vhulimi na zwiṅwe zwikili.

src_text: many young people want to start their own businesses.
tgt_text: vhunzhi ha vhaswa vha ṱoḓa u thoma mabindu a vhone vhaṋe.

src_text: they lack the technical skills that can help them start their own businesses.
tgt_text: vha shaya zwikili zwa thekhi nikhala zwine zwa nga vha thu sa u thoma mabindu a vhone vhaṋe.

src_text: the intervention will support the growth of youth entrepreneurs.
tgt_text: thusedzo i ḓo tikedza nyaluwo ya vhoramabindu vha vhaswa.

src_text: entrepreneurship is certainly not a panacea, but i am convinced that it is one effective and proven way to confer identity and purpose, a sense of belonging, and hope for the future for the youth.
tgt_text: ngoho ndi ya uri u ita zwa mabindu a si thandululo ya thaidzo dzoṱhe, fhedzi ndi a tenda tshoṱhe uri ndi iṅwe ya nḓila dzo lingwaho dzi shumaho u ambedzana nga vhuṋe na ndivho, ndeme ya u vha tshipi ḓa, na fulufhelo ḽa vhumatshelo ha vhaswa.

src_text: the presidential youth service programme provides opportunities for young people to give back to their communities.
tgt_text: mbekanyamushumo ya tshumelo ya vhaswa ya ofisi ya muphuresidennde i ṋetshedza zwikhala vhaswa uri vha shumele zwitshavha zwa havho.

src_text: this initiative is designed to effect change and make an impact at scale, as opposed to fragmented programmes that have had limited impact.
tgt_text: vhurangeli uhu ho dzudzanywa u ḓisa tshanduko na u vha na mvelelo dzi vhonalaho vhukuma, musi zwi tshi vhambedzwa na mbekanyamushumo dzi songo ṱumanaho dze dza vha na mvelelo ṱhukhu.

src_text: i also announced in the state of the nation address that we will set aside 1% of the national budget for a youth employ ment initiative.
tgt_text: ndo dovha nda ḓivhadza kha mulaedza wa lushaka uri ri ḓo vhetshela thungo 1% ya mugaganyagwama wa lushaka ine ya ḓo shuma kha vhurangeli ha mishumo ya vhaswa.

src_text: a number of programmes and projects are being designed to address this national challenge.
tgt_text: tshivhalo tsha mbekanyamushumo na thandela zwi khou dzudza nywa u ḓo sedzana na khaedu dza lushaka.

src_text: the youth of our country clearly see this as a land of opportunity and promise, despite the obstacles they encounter.
tgt_text: vhaswa vha shango ḽashu zwi tou vha khagala uri vha vhona izwi sa shango ḽine ḽa vha na tshikhala na u ṋea fulufhelo , naho hu na zwikhakhisi zwine vha ṱangana nazwo.

src_text: in the past week alone i have met several young south africans who make me proud of just how far we have come and what we have achieved.
tgt_text: kha vhege nthihi yo fhiraho ndo ṱangana na vhaswa vho vhalaho vha afrika tshipembe vhane ra ḓihudza ngavho ri tshi sedza hune ra bva hone na zwe ra zwi swikela.

src_text: there are young sports people like golfing prodigy sim ‘tiger’ tshabalala who is racking up international golfing awards at the tender age of 8. he is ranked 7th in the world in his age group and has won the us kids golf tournament twice.
tgt_text: hu na vhathu vha mitambo vha tshe vhaṱuku u fana mukoni vhukuma wa golofo sim "tiga tshabalala ane a vha kha vhuimo ha nṱha kha u wina pfufho dza zwa golofo dza dzitshaka a kha ḓi tou vha na miṅwaha ya malo fhedzi.

src_text: my spirits were lifted when grade 11 learner sinoyolo qumba from orange farm wrote to me about what should be in this year’s sona.
tgt_text: u kha vhuimo ha vhusumbe kha ḽifhasi kha tshi gwada tsha vha miṅwaha yawe nahone o wina thonamennde ya golofo ya us kids luvhili lwoṱhe.

src_text: she actually joined our speechwriting team in the drafting process.
tgt_text: muya wanga wo ḓo takala vhukuma musi mugudi wa gireidi ya 11 sinoyolo qu mba u bva orange farm a tshi nṅwalela nga ha zwine zwa tea u vha kha sona ya ṅwaha uno.

src_text: there are passionate activists like ayakha melithafa from eerste rivier in the western cape, who attended this year’s world economic forum in davos to call on world leaders to stand firmly for climate justice.
tgt_text: zwavhuḓivhuḓi o ṱanganela na thimu yashu ya u ṅwala tshipitshi kha phurosese ya mvetamve to.

src_text: i was bowled over when i met michelle nkamankeng who, at 11 years old, is africa’s youngest author and is ranked among the top ten youngest writers in the world.
tgt_text: hu na vhalwelatshanduko vho ḓikumedzelaho u fana na ayakha melithafa u bva ngei eerste rivier kapa vhukovhela, we a dzhenela kha foramu ya zwa ikonomi ya ḽifhasi ngei davos u ita khuwelelo kha vharangaphanḓa vha ḽifhasi uri vha ime vho khwaṱha kha vhulamukanyi ha zwa kilima.

src_text: the author of seven books and wrote her first book at the age of 6 years old.
tgt_text: ndo vha ndo mangala vhukuma musi ndi tshi ṱangana na michelle nkamankeng ane, kha miṅwaha ya 11, ndi ene muṅwali muṱukusa nahone u vhaliwa kha vhaṅwali vhaṱukusa vha maimo a nṱha vha fumi ḽifhasini.

src_text: as professor jonathan jansen said: "she is confident, articulate, insightful and passionate."
tgt_text: muṅwali wa bugu dza sumbe o ṅwala bugu yawe ya mathomo a na miṅwaha ya rathi.

src_text: it is these young people who are the real jewels of our country’s future and who remind us that our freedom was won through the sacrifices of the young men and women who were determined that not only they, but those who came after, should live in the light of freedom.
tgt_text: sa zwe phurofesa vho jonathan jansen vha amba: u na vhuḓifulufheli, u kona u amba, u na nḓivho na vhudugambilu.

src_text: we must continue to work together as government, business, labour and civil society to ensure that the burden of unemployment does not continue to weigh down our young people, crush their spirits and cause them to become despondent.
tgt_text: "ndi vhaswa avha vhane vha vha dzhuwele dza vhukuma dza vhumatshelo ha shango ḽashu vha ri humbudzaho uri mbofholowo yo winiwa nga kha zwiṱhavhelo zwa vhanna na vhafumakadzi vhaswa vhe vha vha vho ḓiimisela uri hu si vhone fhedzi, fhedzi na avho vhe vha ḓa nga murahu vha fanela u tshila kha tshedza tsha mbofholowo.

src_text: i am confident that the actions we outlined in the sona will represent a new frontier for youth development as frantz fanon said, it is to each generation to discover its mission.
tgt_text: ri fanela u bvela phanḓa na u shumisana sa muvhuso, mabindu, vhashumi na vhadzulapo u khwaṱhisedza uri muhwalo wa vhushayamushumo a u khou bvela phanḓa na u lemela vha swa vhashu, u pwasha mimuya yavho, zwa vhanga uri vha fhelelwe nga fulufhelo.

src_text: this generation has discovered theirs.
tgt_text: ndi na fulufhelo ḽa uri mishumo ye ra i sumbedzisa kha sona i ḓo imela mukano muswa wa mveledziso ya vhaswa.

src_text: it is now up to us to support them to fulfil it.
tgt_text: sa zwe frantz fanon a amba, ndi u funza murafho muṅwe na muṅwe u tumbula mishini wawo.

src_text: it is a historical fact that a nation’s failure to successfully nurture and enhance the capabilities of its youth spells doom for the future of that country.
tgt_text: vhaswa ndi vhone vhumatshelo ha shango ḽashu vukuzenzele unnamed u ambedzana na vha swa zwi anzela u ntsia ndi na mafulufulu.

src_text: bmw joins the fight against gbv vukuzenzele unnamed bmw group south africa has handed over five bmw i3 cars that will be used by communitybased care workers to reach victims of genderbased violence.
tgt_text: bmw i ḓidzhenisa kha zwa u lwisana na gbv vukuzenzele unnamed tshigwada tsha afri ka tshipembe tsha ha bmw tsho ṋekedza goloi ṱhanu dza bmw i3 dzine dza ḓo shumiswa nga vhashumeli vha ndo ndolo zwitshavhani u itela u swikelela vhapondwa vha khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu.

src_text: the vehicles were received by president cyril ramaphosa and german chancellor angela merkel before being hand ed over to the south african business coalition on health and aids (sabcoha) to manage on behalf of the multisectoral interim steering committee on genderbased violence and femicide (gbvf).
tgt_text: goloi dzo ṱanganedzwa nga muphuresidennde vho cyril ramaphosa na mukhantseḽara wa german vho angela merkel.

src_text: the automotive group’s contribution demonstrates the growing partnership between government and civil society, which includes the business sector and international partners, in the fight against gbvf.
tgt_text: dzo ṋekedziwa ṱhanganelano ya mabindu ya afrika tshipembe kha zwa mutakalo na aids (sabcoha) u itela u langula tshiimo ho imelwa komiti ndanguli pfareli ya sekithara dza tshivhalo dza nga ha khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu na mabulayo a vhafumakadzi (gbvf).

src_text: the initiative is part of the automotive industry transformation fund (worth r6 billion), which was established to increase participation in the sector by previously and historically disadvantaged groups, including women, youth and people with disabilities.
tgt_text: u shela mulenzhe ha tshigwada tsha vhamagi vha dzigoloi ho sumbedza vhufarisani vhune ha khou aluwa vhukati ha muvhuso na vhadzulapo, zwine zwa katela sekithara ya zwa vhubindudzi na vhashumisani vha dzitshakatshaka, kha u lwa na gbvf.

src_text: speaking at the vehicle handover ceremony, held at the bmw group production plant in rosslyn, tshwane, president ramaphosa said the vehicles will help to save lives.
tgt_text: vhurangeli uvhu ndi tshipiḓa tsha tshikwama tsha tshanduko tsha mamaga a zwiendisi (tsha mutengo u linganaho r6 biḽioni), tshine tsho thomiwa u itela u shandukisa matshimbidzele a zwa vhumagi ha dzigoli na u konisa u shela mulenzhe kha sekithara nga zwigwada zwine zwo vha zwo tsikeledzwa kale hu tshi katelwa vhafumakadzi, vhaswa na vhaholefhali.

src_text: he expressed his gratitude to bmw for being the first company to donate the vehicles, and encouraged others to follow suit.
tgt_text: musi vha tshi khou amba kha vhuṱambo ha u ṋekedza zwiendisi, ho farelwaho hune ha bveledzwa zwiendisi zwa tshigwada tsha ha bmw ngei rosslyn, tshwane zwenezwino, muphuresidennde vho ramaphosa vho ri zwiendisi zwi ḓo thusa u vhulunga vhutshilo.

src_text: "this practical expression of good corporate citizenship is sending a very good and clear message that we would like many other companies to also notice and adopt,president ramaphosa said.
tgt_text: vho livhisa ndivhuwo dzavho kha vha ha bmw kha u vha khamphani ya u thoma u ṋekedza zwiendisi, na u ṱuṱuwedza vhaṅwe uri vha tevhedze zwe vha ita.

src_text: emergency response plan to address gbvfgovernment has been im plementing an emergency response plan to address gbvf.
tgt_text: "haya maitele a u sumbedza vhubindudzi havhuḓi ha vhudzulapo a khou rumela mulaedza wavhuḓi nahone u re khagala wa uri ri khou tama dziṅwe khamphani dzi tshi zwi vhona nahone dzi tevhedzele maitele aya.

src_text: a national strategic plan on gbvf, which outlines a range of measures to tackle gbvf, has also been developed.
tgt_text: "u vha hone ha bmw afrika tshipembe zwi sumbedza vhushaka ha kale ho khwaṱhaho na mbofho ya vhubindudzi vhukati ha germany na afrika tshipembe" muphuresidennde vho ramaphosa vho ralo.

src_text: "the plan focuses on strengthening prevention efforts, and ensuring safety and justice for the women and children of our country.
tgt_text: pulane ya vhufhinduli ya shishi ya u lwa na gbv"muvhuso wo vha u tshi khou ḓi shumisa pulane ya vhufhi nduli ya shishi ya u lwa na gbvf.

src_text: the plan also touches on economic empowerment, an area that is so important that we, as government, will be focusing on," president ramaphosa said.
tgt_text: pulane ya zwa tshiṱirathe dzhi ya lushaka ya gbvf, ine ya sumbedza maga a u lwa na gbvf, na yone yo no bvele dzwa.

src_text: group head of production and chairman of bmw south africa, dr milan nedeljkovic, said 4 000 people in south africa are directly employed at bmw group, and four out of five managers are local.
tgt_text: "pulane yo sedzana na u khwaṱhisa ndingedzo dza u thivhela, na u kwaṱhisedza tsireledzo na vhulamukanyi kha vhafumakadzi na vhana vha shango ḽashu.

src_text: in addition to this, more than 40 000 people are employed indirectly through the company’s utilities in south africa.
tgt_text: pulane i dovha ya kwama na u bveledzisa ikonomi, tshipiḓa tshine tsha vha tsha ndeme tshine, sa muvhuso, ra ḓo sedzesa khatsho," vho ralo muphure sidennde vho ramaphosa.ṱhoho ya tshigwada tsha mveledziso na mudzula tshidulo wa ha bmw afrika tshipembe, vho dr milan nedeljkovic, vho ri vhathu vha linganaho 4 000 vha afrika tshipembe vho tholwa nga tshigwada tsha ha bmw, hu tshi katelwa na vhalanguli vhaṋa kha vhaṱanu vhane vha vha vhathu vhapo.

src_text: "our first formal training facility in bmw sa opened its doors in 1978 and since then, more than 2 000 have gone through training with bmw and received jobs at bmw," nedeljkovic said.
tgt_text: nṱha ha izwi, vho nedeljko vic vho ri vhathu vha 40 000 vho tholwa nga zwiimiswa zwi shumiswaho nga khamphani afrika tshipembe.

src_text: he said the company’s philosophy underlines that education is the key to success, and "lifelong learning through bmw group is part of that success".
tgt_text: "tshiimiswa tshashu tsha vhupfumbudzi tsha u tou thoma tsha tshiofisi ha bmw sa tsho thoma nga 1978 nahone u bva zwenezwo, vhathu vha fhiraho 2 000 vho pfu mbudziwa nga bmw vha wana mishumo ha bmw.

src_text: "by 2025, we will support one million children and young people globally through targeted education programmes, focusing on skills programmes."
tgt_text: bmw i ḓidzhenisa kha zwa u lwisana na gbv vukuzenzele unnamed tshigwada tsha afri ka tshipembe tsha ha bmw tsho ṋekedza goloi ṱhanu dza bmw i3 dzine dza ḓo shumiswa nga vhashumeli vha ndo ndolo zwitshavhani u itela u swikelela vhapondwa vha khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu.

src_text: let us work together to fix our finances vukuzenzele unnamed the budget presented by finance minister tito mboweni presents a sobering assessment of the state of our economy.
tgt_text: kha ri shumisane roṱhe u itela u dzudzanya zwa masheleni ashu vukuzenzele unnamed mugaganyagwama wo ṋetshedzwa ho nga minisṱa wa zwa masheleni vho tito mboweni wo sumbedza ṱhaṱhuvho ya ndemesa ya tshiimo tsha ikonomi yashu.

src_text: the figures make it plain that unless we act now to turn things around, there will be even more difficult times ahead.
tgt_text: figara dzo zwi vhea khagala zwauri ra sa ita nyito zwino ra shandukisa zwithu, hu ḓo vha na zwifhinga zwinzhi zwi koṋdaho phanḓa.

src_text: put simply, we are spending far more than we are earning.
tgt_text: zwo vheiwa nga nḓila i lelu waho, ri khou shumisa mashele ni manzhi u fhirisa zwine ra khou hola zwone.

src_text: as a result, we are borrowing more and more, and the cost of servicing that debt is rising.
tgt_text: zwo ralo, ri khou hadzimesa, mbadelo dza u kona u badela tshikolodo itsho nga nḓila kwao dzi khou gonya.

src_text: in fact, debt service costs are now the fastestgrowing area of expenditure.
tgt_text: zwa vhukuma ndi zwauri, mbadelo dza u kona u badela tshikolodo nga nḓila kwao zwazwino ndi yone tshinyalelo i no khou aluwa nga luvhilo.

src_text: we spend more on debt repayments than we do on health; only education and social development get more.
tgt_text: ri shumisesa masheleni manzhi kha mbadelamurahu ya tshikolodo u fhirisa zwine ra ita kha mutakalo; ndi kha mveledzi so ya zwa matshilisano na zwa pfunzo fhedzi hune ha wanwa masheleni manzhi.

src_text: this position is precarious and unsustainable.
tgt_text: tshiimo itshi tshi a tima timisa nahone a si tshine ra nga ṱuwa ngatsho.

src_text: we need to make significant changes and we need to make them now.
tgt_text: ri tea u ita tshanduko dza ndeme nahone ri tea u dzi ita zwino.

src_text: there are several reasons for the position we’re now in.
tgt_text: hu na zwiitisi zwo vhalaho zwa tshiimo tshine ra vha kha tsho zwino.

src_text: our economy has not grown much over the last decade, mainly due to the 2008 global financial crisis and a decline in demand for the minerals that we export.
tgt_text: ikonomi yashu a yo ngo aluwesa kha miṅwaha ya fumi yo fhiraho, zwo itiswa nga vilili ḽa ḽifhasi ḽa zwa mashele ni ḽa 2008 na u fhungudzea ha ṱhoḓea ya mineraḽa dzine ra vhambadzela nnḓa.

src_text: as a result, revenue collection has been weak and we have had to borrow more to sustain spending on development, infrastructure and wages.
tgt_text: zwo ralo, khuvhanganyo ya mbuelo yo vha fhasisa nahone ro tou tea u koloda zwinzhi u itela u bve ledza u shumisa masheleni kha mveledziso, themamveledziso na kha miholo.

src_text: at the same time, state capture and corruption has affected governance, operational effectiveness and financial sustainability at several public institutions, including stateowned enterprises (soes).
tgt_text: nga tshifhinga themamveledziso tshithihi, u hombokwa ha muvhuso na tshanḓanguvhoni zwo kwama mavhusele, mashumele kwao na vhudziki ha zwa masheleni kha zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso zwo vhalaho, zwi tshi katela mabindu a langwaho nga mu vhuso (dzisoe).

src_text: efforts over the last two years to revive the economy and rebuild institutions have now been undermined by the electricity crisis, further constraining growth and placing an additional burden on public finances.
tgt_text: ndingedzo dza kha miṅwa ha mivhili yo fhiraho dza u vusulusa ikonomi na u fhaṱu lula zwiimiswa zwazwino zwi khou dzhielwa fhasi nga vilili ḽa muḓagasi, iṅwe nyaluwo i konḓaho na u vhea muṅwe muhwalo hafhu kha masheleni a muvhuso.

src_text: our priorities in this budget therefore are to put the economy back on a path of growth, constrain public spending and stabilise our debt.
tgt_text: zwipikwa zwashu kha mu gaganyagwama uyu zwo ralo ndi u vhuedzedza ikonomi kha gondo ḽa nyaluwo, ndango ya tshumiso ya masheleni a mu vhuso na u vhea tshikolodo tshashu kha ngona.

src_text: the budget is an integral part of our drive for inclusive growth, job creation, investment and a capable state.
tgt_text: mugaganyagwama ndi tshipi ḓa tsha ndeme tsha vhutshi mbidzi hashu u itela nyaluwo i katelaho zwoṱhe, u sika mishu mo, vhubindudzi na muvhuso u ḓikonaho.

src_text: we have made a deliberate decision not to pursue a path of austerity.
tgt_text: ro ita tsheo i re kha ngona hu si u tevhela nḓila ya nyimele ya ikonomi i si yavhuḓi.

src_text: such a route would have seen deep cuts in spending on the social services that poor people rely on.
tgt_text: nḓila iyo yo vha i tshi ḓo vhona hune ha tea u fhungudzwa nga maanḓa kha u shumisa masheleni kha tshumelo dza matshilisano dzine vhashai vha ḓitika ngadzo.

src_text: it could have involved dramatically reducing the salaries of civil servants, the size of the public service, cutting bonuses and pensions, raising taxes and selling off key state assets.
tgt_text: zwo vha zwi tshi ḓo dzhenisesa nga maanḓa phungudzo ya miholo ya vhashumeli vha muvhuso, muelo wa vhashumi vha mu vhuso, u fhungudza bonasi na phensheni, u engedza muthelo na u rengisa thundu dza mu vhuso dza ndeme.

src_text: an austerity budget would have damaged our growth prospects further and weakened the ability of the state to stimulate economic activity and meet people’s needs.
tgt_text: mugaganyagwama wa nyi mele ya ikonomi i si yavhuḓi wo vha u tshi ḓo vha wo vhaisa hafhu khonadzeo ya nyaluwo wa hoṱefhadza khonadzeo ya muvhuso u ṱuṱuwedza nyito ya ikonomi na u swikela ṱhoḓea dza vhathu.

src_text: we have instead presented a budget that contains a range of balanced and wellconsidered measures to contain spending, increase revenue and encourage growth.
tgt_text: naho zwo ralo, ro ṋetshedza mugaganyagwama wo faraho mutshotshonono wa maga o sedzwaho zwavhuḓi nahone o dzudzanyeaho u itela u fara zwavhuḓi mashumisele a masheleni, nyaluso ya muthelo wa mbuelo na ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya nyaluwo.

src_text: over the next three years, we expect to achieve savings of around r261 billion by cutting the budgets of several departments and reducing the rate at which the public service wage bill increases.
tgt_text: kha miṅwaha miraru i ḓaho, ri khou lavhelela u swikela mbulungelo ya henefha kha r261 biḽioni nga u fhungudza migaganyagwama ya mihasho minzhi na u fhungudza phimo ine mulayotibe wa muholo wa tshumelo ya muvhuso wa engedzwa ngayo.

src_text: at the same time, however, we will need to spend more to support the restructuring of soes like eskom and saa.
tgt_text: kha tshifhi nga tshenetsho tshithihi, naho zwo ralo, ri khou tea u shumisa masheleni manzhi u tikedza u dzudzanywa hafhu ha mabindu a langwaho nga muvhuso a nga ho sa eskom na saa.

src_text: as a result, we expect a net reduction of r156 billion in noninterest spending over the medium term.
tgt_text: zwo ralo, ri lavhelela ṱhumbulotsalela ya r156 biḽioni kha u shumiswa ha masheleni kha zwi si na mui ngapfuma kha tshifhingakati.

src_text: this will help to narrow the deficit and reduce our borrowing needs.
tgt_text: izwi zwi ḓo thusa u fhungu dza ṱhahelelo na u fhungudza ṱhoḓea dzashu dza u hadzima.

src_text: a large part of the savings will come from reducing the rate at which our wage bill grows.
tgt_text: tshipiḓa tshihulwane tsha u vhulunga tshi ḓo bva kha u fhungudza phimo ine mulayo tibe washu wa muholo wa alu wa ngatsho.

src_text: this will require focused discussions among all social partners, but particularly with public sector unions.
tgt_text: izwi zwi ḓo ṱoḓa nyambedzano dzo dzudzanaho nga ngona vhukati ha vhashu misani vhoṱhe vha zwa ma tshilisano, fhedzi nga maanḓa na vha mbumbano dza sekithara dza muvhuso.

src_text: these engagements need to be conducted in a spirit of seeking solutions.
tgt_text: vhuḓidzhenisi uhu vhu tea u tshimbidzwa nga muya wa u ṱoḓa thandululo.

src_text: i am heartened by the willingness of all parties to engage in serious negotiations aimed at finding a solution.
tgt_text: ndi a khwaṱhiswa nga lutamo lwa madzangano oṱhe lwa u ḓidzhenisa kha nyambedzano dza vhuṱhogwa dzo sedzaho kha u wana thandululo.

src_text: our approach is not to dramatically cut the size of the public service, but to examine the rate at which wages grow.
tgt_text: maitele ashu a si a u tou fhu ngudza muelo wa tshumelo dza muvhuso nga u tou hwiḓa, fhedzi ndi u tou ṱola phimo ine miholo ya aluwa ngayo.

src_text: public service wages have on average increased at a much higher rate than inflation over many years, and we need to fix this if we are to get public finances under control.
tgt_text: miholo ya tshumelo dza muvhuso i na u ya nga mbalotshikati nyengedzo i na phimo ya nṱhesa u fhirisa inflesheni lwa miṅwaha minzhi, zwo ralo ri tea u dzudzanya hezwi zwithu arali ri tshi khou ṱoḓa u wana masheleni a mu vhuso a kha ndango.

src_text: this also applies to the management of people’s personal finances, where if any expenditure item that rises at a rate more than inflation – be it electricity tariffs, mobile tariffs or food – will always put any individual person’s budget and finances under strain and out of kilter.
tgt_text: izwi zwi dovha zwa ya na kha ndango ya masheleni a vhathu vhone vhaṋe, hune arali tshiteṅwa tshi no shumisa masheleni tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tshine tsha aluwa kha phimo i fhiraho inflesheni – hu nga vha mbadelotiwa dza muḓagasi, mbadelotiwa dza ṱhingokhwalwa kana zwiḽi wa – zwi ḓo dzulela u vhea mugaganyagwama muṅwe na muṅwe wa muthu ene muṋe na masheleni fhasi ha mutsiko na u sa vha kha ngona.

src_text: the wage bill remains the largest component of spending by economic classification.
tgt_text: mulayotibe wa muholo u dzu lela u vha tshipiḓa tshihulwane sa tsha u shumisa masheleni zwi tshi ya nga khethekanyo ya ikonomi.

src_text: growth in the wage bill has begun crowding out spending on capital projects for future growth and items that are critical for service delivery.
tgt_text: nyaluwo kha mulayo yibe wa muholo yo no thoma u bvisela thungo zwa u shu misa masheleni kha thandela dza pfuma u itela nyaluwo ya tshifhinga tshiḓaho na zwite ṅwa zwine zwa vha zwa ndeme kha nḓisedzo ya tshumelo.

src_text: the public service wage bill is by no means the only area where we are cutting costs.
tgt_text: mulayotibe wa muholo wa vhashumeli vha muvhuso u nga si vuwe wo vha wone fhedzi une ra khou fhungudza mbadelo.

src_text: i have decided that there will be no increase in the salaries of senior public office bearers this year.
tgt_text: ndo humbula zwauri a hu nga vhi na nyengedzo kha miholo ya vhaofisiri vha mu vhuso vhahulwane ṋaṅwaha.

src_text: this follows a reduction in benefits stemming from changes to the ministerial handbook.
tgt_text: izwi zwi khou tevhela ṱhumbu lo kha mbuelo dzo simuwaho zwi tshi bva kha tshanduko dzi re kha bugupfarwa ya dziminisṱa.

src_text: we will publish a new law this year introducing a remuneration framework for public entities and state owned companies to prevent excessive pay for board members and executives.
tgt_text: ri ḓo anḓadza mu layo muswa ṋaṅwaha une wa ḓivhadza muhanga wa miholo ya zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso na khamphani dzi langwaho nga muvhuso u thivhela mbadelo dzo kalulaho dza miraḓo ya bodo na vhaofisiri vhahulwane.

src_text: our trade union compatriots are right in saying that we should in a demonstrable way prevent leakages of public funds by addressing corruption, ending irregular, fruitless and wasteful expenditure.
tgt_text: vhashumisani na riṋe vha mbumbano ya vhashumi vha kha ngoho musi vha tshi amba uri ri tea nga nḓila i vhonalaho u thivhela u bva kana u bvuḓiswa ha masheleni a muvhuso nga u amba nga ha tshanḓanguvhoni, u fhelisa zwithu zwi si ho kha ngona, tshumiso ya masheleni nga nḓila ya u sa londa.

src_text: we will do this and much more.
tgt_text: he zwi ri ḓo zwi ita na zwiṅwe zwinzhi.

src_text: as much as containing the public wage bill is critical to stabilising public finances, improving public sector performance is imperative if we want to build a more capable, efficient state.
tgt_text: naho u fara mulayotibe wa miholo ya vhashumeli vha mu vhuso zwi zwa ndeme u itela u vhea kha ngona masheleni a muvhuso, u khwinisa mashu mele a sekithara dza muvhuso ndi zwa ndeme nga maanḓa arali ri tshi khou ṱoḓa u fhaṱa muvhuso u na vhukoni vhu hulwane.

src_text: we need more of the right people in the right positions.
tgt_text: ri ṱoḓa vhunzhi ha vhathu kwao kha maimo kwao.

src_text: as we contain public spending, we are pursuing growth.
tgt_text: musi ri tshi fara tshumiso ya masheleni a muvhuso, ri khou fungelela nyaluwo.

src_text: it is for this reason that, despite the fiscal gap, there are no major tax increases.
tgt_text: ndi nga ṅwambo wa hezwi uri, naho hu na tshikhala kha zwa masheleni, a hu na nyengedzo ya muthelo khulwane.

src_text: instead, there is some relief for individual tax payers and several measures to broaden the corporate tax base.
tgt_text: madzuloni azwo, hu na u rulwa nyana ha vhatheli na maga o vhalaho u itela u alu sa mbadelo ya phimamuthelo wa vhabindudzi.

src_text: we are also pushing ahead with farreaching reforms in areas like electricity provision, ports and rail and telecommunications to reduce the cost of doing business.
tgt_text: ri khou ya phanḓa na tshanduko dza ndeme kha masia a ngaho sa ṋetshedzo ya muḓagasi, vhuimangalavha na zwiporo khathihi na vhudavhidzani ha kule u fhungudza mbadelo dza vhubindudzi.

src_text: through the infrastructure fund we aim to mobilise financing from a range of sources to invest in a massive build programme.
tgt_text: nga kha tshi kwama tsha themamveledziso ro lavhelela u tshimbidza zwa u ṋetshedza masheleni u bva kha zwiko zwo vhalaho u itela u vhulunga kha mbekanyamu shumo ya u fhaṱa khulwane.

src_text: through our industrial strategy and investment drive we are unlocking vital areas of growth.
tgt_text: nga kha tshimbidzo yashu ya tshiṱirathedzhi tsha zwa nḓowetshumo na mbulungelo ri khou vula masia manzhi a nyaluwo.

src_text: we are fixing our public finances to make inclusive growth and job creation possible.
tgt_text: ri khou dzudzanya masheleni ashu a muvhuso u itela uri nya luwo i angaredzaho zwoṱhe na u sika mishumo zwi konadzee.

src_text: such times call for us to be realistic, not dogmatic.
tgt_text: zwifhinga zwo raloho zwi ṱoḓa riṋe ri tshi ḓivha zwine zwa tea u itwa, ri si vhe vhathu vha sa koni u shandukisi kuhumbule le.

src_text: they call for cooperation, not conflict.
tgt_text: tshi ṱoḓa tshumisano, hu si khuḓano.

src_text: compromises and tradeoffs will have to be made.
tgt_text: u pfesesana na u ḓikumedzela zwi tea u itwa.

src_text: we are all in this together, and we share a collective responsibility to take the oars, to row in unison and steer our country through these stormy waters.
tgt_text: kha ri shumisane roṱhe u itela u dzudzanya zwa masheleni ashu vukuzenzele unnamed mugaganyagwama wo ṋetshedzwa ho nga minisṱa wa zwa masheleni vho tito mboweni wo sumbedza ṱhaṱhuvho ya ndemesa ya tshiimo tsha ikonomi yashu.

src_text: patient support crucial for fighting tb dale hes the usaid tuberculosis south africa project is proving to be a perfect example of how government, communities and ngos can partner together to combat tuberculosis (tb) by providing proper support to patients.
tgt_text: thikhedzo ya mulwadze ndi ya ndeme kh a u lwa na tb dale hes thandela ya afrika tshipembe ya lufhi ha ya usaid i khou sumbedza u vha tsumbo yavhuḓi ya uri muvhuso, zwitshavha na dzingo, zwoṱhe zwi nga shumisana u fhelisa lufhiha (tb) nga u ṋetshedza vhalwadze thikhedzo kwao.

src_text: south africa has taken a position of leadership in the global fight against tb, and the united states agency for international development (usaid) has stepped in to provide assistance.
tgt_text: afrika tshipembe ḽo dzhia vhuimo ha vhurangaphanḓa kha nndwa ya ḽifhasi ya u lwisana na tb, zhendedzi ḽa united states ḽa mveledziso ya tshakatshaka (usaid) ḽo ḓidzhenisa u itela u ṋetshedza thusedzo.

src_text: the fiveyear project, which started in 2016, is being carried out in partnership with the national department of health in eight of south africa’s provinces.
tgt_text: thandela ya miṅwaha miṱanu, ye ya thoma nga 2016, i khou tshimbidzwa i na tshumisano na muhasho wa mutakalo wa lushaka kha mavundu a malo a afrika tshipembe.

src_text: one of the most important parts of the project is to support communitybased ngos.
tgt_text: tshiṅwe tsha zwipiḓa zwa ndemesa tsha thandela ndi u tikedza ngo dza zwitshavha.

src_text: the project provides funding to 21 ngos who have supported more than 3 500 patients, the majority based in rural areas.
tgt_text: thandela i ṋetshedza ndambedzo kha ngo dza 21 dze dza tikedza vhalwadze vha fhiraho 3500, vhunzhi havho vha wanala vhuponi ha mahayani.

src_text: free state progressbased in mangaung, mosamoria is one of the ngos which has received funding from the project.
tgt_text: mosamoria mosamoria kha ḽa kha ḽa free free statestatei wanala kha ḽa mangaung, mosamaria ndi iṅwe ya dzingo dze dza wana ndambedzo i tshi bva kha thandela.

src_text: the organisation has a team of community health workers, a project manager and a data capturer who all work towards ensuring that patients stay on treatment so that they can be cured in a six month period.
tgt_text: dzangano iḽo ḽi na tshigwada tsha vhashu mi vha zwa mutakalo zwitshavhani, mulangulathandela na mufaradata vhane vhoṱhe vha shuma u itela u vhona uri vhalwadze vha dzule vha kha dzilafho u itela uri vha fhole kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi ya rathi.

src_text: "we employ 74 care givers for this project.
tgt_text: mukonanyi wa mosamaria vho trudie harrison vho amba uri: "ro thola vhaṋetshedzandondolo vha 74. mathomoni ro shuma na vhalwadze vha 200, ha ḓa vhalwadze vha 400, na uri zwazwino ri na vhalwadze vha 500 kha khonṱiraka vhane ra shuma navho ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.

src_text: initially we worked with 200 patients, then 400 patients, and in our current contract we have 500 patients who we work with on a daily basis.
tgt_text: vhalwadze vha rumelwa kha riṋe musi vho ṱhaṱhuvhiwa vha wanala vha na tb vha tshi bva kha kiḽiniki dzo fhambanaho dza ṱahe ḓoroboni khulwane ya mangaung."

src_text: the patients are referred to us when they have been diagnosed as having tb from nine different clinics in the mangaung metro," says mosamaria coordinator trudie harrison.
tgt_text: mosamaria i tshimbidza mafu lo a u ṱhaṱhuvha a muḓi nga muḓi ṅwedzi muṅwe na muṅwe u itela u wanulusa vhalwadze vhaswa vha tb na u mbo ḓidzheniswa kha dzilafho nga u ṱavhanya.

src_text: mosamaria conducts monthly doortodoor screening campaigns to find new tb patients and get them on treatment immediately.
tgt_text: vho harrison vho amba uri mushumo wa mosamoria wo fhungudza samba ḽi ṱumanyi swaho na tb, wa fhaṱa vhusha ka vhu re tsinisa na tshitshavha wa dovha hafhu wa isa kha phimo dza khwine dza dzilafho kwao.

src_text: harrison says that mosamoria’s work has reduced the stigma around tb, built close relationships with the community and also led to much better rates of successful treatment.
tgt_text: vho harrison vho amba uri: "sa tsumbo, nga 2018, vhalwadze vhashu vha 514 vho fhola."

src_text: "for example, in 2018, 514 of our patients were cured," harrison says.
tgt_text: vho harrison vho kovhana tshiṱori tsha muṅwe wa vhalwadze vha mosamaria.

src_text: harrison shares the story of one of mosamaria’s patients.
tgt_text: vho vha vha tshi khou ṋewa thikhedzo ya ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe nga muṋetshedzandondolo wa mosamaria, we a vhona zwa uri vha mila philisi dzavho ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe vha dovha vha thuswa nga mugayo na zwiambaro zwiswa.

src_text: he was given daily support by a mosamaria caregiver, who ensured that he swallowed his tablets every day and also assisted with maize meal and new clothes.
tgt_text: vho harrison vho amba uri: "vho khunyeledza dzilafho nahone vho fhola.

src_text: "he completed the treatment and was cured.
tgt_text: vho humela mushumoni saizwi mutholi wavho o vha vhetshela mushumo wavho.

src_text: he went back to work as his employer had kept his job for him," says harrison.
tgt_text: thikhedzo ya mulwadze ndi ya ndeme kh a u lwa na tb dale hes thandela ya afrika tshipembe ya lufhi ha ya usaid i khou sumbedza u vha tsumbo yavhuḓi ya uri muvhuso, zwitshavha na dzingo, zwoṱhe zwi nga shumisana u fhelisa lufhiha (tb) nga u ṋetshedza vhalwadze thikhedzo kwao.

src_text: together we can fight the impact of covid 19 vukuzenzele unnamed the world is in the throes of a public health emergency on a scale not witnessed in over a century.
tgt_text: ri roṱhe ri nga kona u lwa na masiandaitwa a covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed ḽifhasi ḽi khou ṱangana na vhuleme vhuhulu ha tshiimo tsha shishi kha mutakalo wa lushaka nga nḓila ine a i athu vhonwa kha miṅwaha i fhiraho ḓana.

src_text: the spread of the coronavirus, which causes the disease known as covid19, has been alarmingly swift and widescale, and is now defined as a global pandemic.
tgt_text: u phaḓalala ha tshitzhili tsha coro na, tshine tshi vhanga vhulwadze ha covid19, ho gidima na u phaḓalala nga nḓila i shavhisaho, na uri zwino tshi vho tou ambiwa sa tshiwo tsha dwadze ḽo phaḓalalaho ḽifhasini.

src_text: it knows no geographical or territorial boundaries, has infected both young and old, and is on the rise in developed and developing countries alike.
tgt_text: a tshi ḓivhi mikaṋo ya fhethu kana vhupo, tsho kavha vhahulwane na vhaṱuku, na uri tshi khou hulela kha mashango o bvelelaho na ane a khou bvelela.

src_text: as screening and testing is scaled up, the number of infections in south africa is expected to rise.
tgt_text: musi u ṱhaṱhuvha na u ita ndingo zwi tshi khou engedzea, tshivhalo tsha u kavhiwa tshi khou lavhelelwa u gonya afrika tshipembe.

src_text: i recently declared a national state of disaster, a measure proportionate to the severity of the threat to our people, to our society and to our economy.
tgt_text: ndi kha ḓi tou bva u ḓivhadza zwenezwino uri hetshi ndi tshiimo tsha tshiwo tsha lushaka, tshikalo tshi linganyiswaho na vhuhulu ha nyimele ya tshutshedzo kha vhathu vhashu, lushaka lwashu na ikonomi yashu.

src_text: this will enable us to have an integrated and coordinated disaster management mechanism and to set up emergency, rapid and effective response systems.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi ḓo ri konisa uri ri vhe na kushumele kwa ndangulo ya tshiwo kwo konanywaho na kwo ṱanganelaho na u dzudzanya sisiṱeme dza shishi dza u fhindula nga u ṱavhanya na nga vhukoni.

src_text: this virus will be extremely disruptive, and our priority is to safeguard the health and wellbeing of all south africans.
tgt_text: hetshi tshitzhili tshi ḓo khakhisa zwihulwane vhukuma, na uri zwa ndemesa kha riṋe ndi u tsireledza mutakalo na vhuvha ha maafrika tshipembe vhoṱhe.

src_text: we also have to address the inevitable economic fallout.
tgt_text: ri tea u dovha ra amba nga ha u wa ha ikonomi he ha vha hu songo lavhelelwa.

src_text: we must expect a decline in exports, a drop in tourist arrivals and a severe impact on production, business viability and job creation and retention.
tgt_text: ri tea u lavhelela u tsela fhasi ha zwivhambadzwaseli, u tsela fhasi ha madalo a vhaendelamashango khathihi na masian daitwa o kalulaho kha vhubveledzi, u shuma kwae ha mabindu na u sika mishumo khathihi na u i vhulunga.

src_text: cabinet is in the process of finalising a comprehensive package of interventions to mitigate the expected impact of covid19 on our economy.
tgt_text: khabinethe i kati na u khunyeledza ṱhoḓea dza thusedzo i angaredzaho zwoṱhe u itela u fhungudza masiandaitwa a covid19 kha ikonomi yashu.

src_text: this is being done in consultation with business, labour and other relevant institutions.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi khou itwa hu na u ambedzana na mabindu, vhashumi na zwiṅwe zwiimiswa zwi kwameaho.

src_text: it was louis pasteur who said that fortune favours the prepared mind.
tgt_text: ndi vho louis pasteur vhe vha amba uri mashudu a wela vha mihumbulo yo ḓilugiselaho.

src_text: south africa is prepared, and has been so for some time.
tgt_text: afrika tshipembe ḽo ḓilugisela, nahone ḽo ḓilugisela u bva na kale.

src_text: since the outbreak was first reported we have acted to put screening and containment measures in place.
tgt_text: u bva tshe ha vhigwa u ṱaha ha vhulwadze lwa u tou thoma, ro shuma u dzudzanya fhethu ha u ṱhaṱhuvha na u vhekanya maga a u vhona uri vhulwadze vhu a langea uri vhu sa phaḓalale.

src_text: our national response has been driven by an interministerial committee (imc) chaired and ably led by the minister of health, dr zweli mkhize.
tgt_text: phindulo yashu sa lushaka yo rangiwa phanḓa nga komiti ya minisiṱa dza tshivhalo (imc) yo dzulwaho phanḓa nga minisiṱa wa mutakalo, vho dokotela zweli mkhize.

src_text: the manner in which the imc and the support teams have responded to this emergency has been both exemplary and reassuring, particularly in helping to quell public panic.
tgt_text: nḓila ine imc na zwigwada zwa thikhedzo vha khou fhindula ngayo kha iḽi shishi yo vha tsumbo na khwaṱhisedzo kha zwoṱhe, nga maanḓa kha u thusa u dzimela u tshuwa ha lushaka.

src_text: i will be chairing a national command council to coordinate all aspects of our national response.
tgt_text: ndi ḓo vha ndi tshi khou dzula phanḓa khoro ya ndaela ya lushaka u itela u konanya masia oṱhe a vhufhinduli hoṱhe ha lushaka.

src_text: south africa has a positive track record in managing public health emergencies.
tgt_text: afrika tshipembe ḽi na rekhodo yavhuḓi ya u langa zwiimo zwa shishi kha mutakalo wa tshitshavha.

src_text: we have the knowledge, the means and the expertise.
tgt_text: ri na nḓivho, nḓila na vhukoni.

src_text: our scientists and epidemiologists are worldclass.
tgt_text: vhorasantsi na vhaḓivhi vha zwa mishonga kha u langa zwa malwadze a phaḓalalaho vha maiimo a nṱha ḽifhasini.

src_text: we have put a raft of emergency measures in place, and will make funding available to support their implementation.
tgt_text: ro dzudzanya mutevhe wa maga a shishi, na uri ri khou vhona uri ndambedzo i vhe hone u itela u tikedza u thoma u shuma hao.

src_text: they include travel bans on visitors from highrisk countries; mandatory testing, selfisolation or quarantine for south african nationals returning from these countries; and strengthening surveillance, screening and testing at ports of entry into the republic.
tgt_text: a katela nyiledzo dza vhaeni u bva mashangoni a re na tshutshedzo khulwanesa, ndingo dzi kombetshedzaho, u ḓikhetha nga iwe muṋe kana u valelwa thungo ha maafrika tshipembe vhane vha khou bva mashangoni a nnḓa u thivhela u phaḓalala ha vhulwadze; khathihi na u khwaṱhisa vhulavhelesi, u ṱhaṱhuvha na ndingo mikaṋoni i no dzhenwa ngayo kha riphabuḽiki.

src_text: social distancing is critical if we are to contain the spread of covid19.
tgt_text: u sa sokou ita miṱangano ndi zwa ndeme arali ri tshi ṱoḓa u langa u phaḓalala ha covid19.

src_text: gatherings of more than 100 people are prohibited and mass celebrations of national days are cancelled.
tgt_text: maguvhangano a vhathu vha fhiraho 100 o iledzwa na vhuṱambo ha u pembela nga magogo kha maḓuvha a holodei a vhu tsha ḓo vha hone.

src_text: visits to all correctional centres are being suspended for 30 days with immediate effect.
tgt_text: madalo kha senthara dzoṱhe dza vhululamisi a kha ḓi vha o fhahewa lwa maḓuvha a 30 u tou bva zwino.

src_text: nonessential international travel for government officials has been proscribed and nonessential domestic travel discouraged.
tgt_text: u endela mashangoḓavha zwi sa tou kombetshedza nga vhaofisiri vhoṱhe vha muvhuso ho iledzwa na uri u enda ha fhano hayani hu sa tou kombetshedza a hu ṱuṱuwedzwi.

src_text: a total of 35 land ports and two sea ports will be closed, as will schools from the 18th of march until after the easter weekend.
tgt_text: mikaṋo ya 35 ya shangoni na mivhili ya lwanzheni i ḓo valwa, na zwikolo u bva nga ḽa 18 ḽa ṱhafamuhwe u swika mafhelo a vhege ya paseka.

src_text: we will soon be announcing measures with regards to universities and colleges.
tgt_text: hu si kale ri ḓo ḓivhadza maga o dzhiiwaho malugana na dziyunivesithi na magudedzi.

src_text: next month will be easter, a sacred period for a number of faiths and a time in which mass services and gatherings will take place.
tgt_text: ṅwedzi u ḓaho ndi paseka, tshifhinga tshikhethwa tsha lutendo lwa vhanzhi na uri ndi tshifhinga tshine mishumo minzhi na maguvhangano zwa ḓo farwa.

src_text: the faith community should take decisions in this regard in the best interests of the health of their congregants and the country as a whole.
tgt_text: tshitshavha tsha vha lutendo vha tea u dzhia tsheo kha heḽi fhungo vho dzhielesa nṱha madzangalelo a mutakalo wa vhakereki vhavho na shango ḽoṱhe nga vhuphara.

src_text: hygiene control should be intensified in all sectors.
tgt_text: ndaulo ya ndondolamutakalo i tea u engedzedzwa kha sekhithara dzoṱhe.

src_text: every citizen should take charge of their own safety by observing measures such as frequent handwashing with soap or handsanitizers and covering their nose or mouth with a tissue or flexed elbow when coughing or sneezing.
tgt_text: mudzulapo muṅwe na muṅwe u tea u dzhia vhuḓifhinduleli ha tsireledzo yawe nga u dzhiela nṱha maga a tsireledzo angaho u dzulela u ṱamba zwanḓa nga tshisibe kana u zwi moṋa nga sanithaiza khathihi na u vala ningo na mulomo nga thishu kana u thivha nga tshanḓa musi vha tshi hoṱola kana u atsamula.

src_text: as part of our national effort the department of health will continue with an intensive and ongoing campaign to raise awareness about prevention, transmission and infection symptoms.
tgt_text: sa tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo ya lushaka, muhasho wa mutakalo u ḓo bvela phanḓa na fulo nga vhuhulu ḽine ḽa khou ḓi ya phanḓa u ita tsivhudzo nga ha thivhelo, u phaḓaladza na tsumbadwadze dza u kavhiwa.

src_text: i encourage all south africans to acquaint themselves with the relevant preventative material.
tgt_text: ndi ṱuṱuwedza maafrika tshipembe vhoṱhe uri vha ḓivhe nga ha zwithivheli zwo teaho.

src_text: these measures are similar to those in other countries, and it is important we all understand that they are not punitive but a matter of public safety.
tgt_text: haya maga a fana na ayo a maṅwe mashango, na uri ndi zwa ndeme zwa uri roṱhe ri pfesese uri a si a u ri vhaisa, fhedzi ndi fhungo ḽa tsireledzo ya tshitshavha.

src_text: one of the greatest dangers at this time is ignorance and misinformation.
tgt_text: tshiṅwe tshine tsha vha khombo khulwanesa tshifhinga hetshi ndi u dzhiela fhasi fhungo heḽi na u sa vha na mafhungo o fhelelaho.

src_text: we should stop spreading fake and unverified news, especially on social media.
tgt_text: ri tea u litsha u sokou tshimbidza mafhungo a si one nahone a songo khwaṱhisedzwaho, nga maanḓa kha nyanḓadzamafhungo dza zwitshavha.

src_text: this can exacerbate an already tense national mood and damage the national effort.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi nga kuṱedza ḽimu di ḽa u sinyuwa ḽine lushaka lwo no vha khaḽo khathihi na u tshinyadza ndingedzo dza lushaka.

src_text: we must also not give in to the expressions of bigotry that we have seen in other countries directed at nationals of countries from where the outbreak began or the current epicenter in europe.
tgt_text: na uri riṋe ri songo ḓidzhenisa kha maitele a u sa konḓelelana hune ra vha na kuvhonele ku sa fani sa zwine ra khou zwi vhona kha maṅwe mashango he u ṱaha ha uvhu vhulwadze ho thoma hone kana hune zwazwino ha vho tou vha luvholelani lwa hone ngei yuropa.

src_text: this is clearly a virus that affects people of all nationalities.
tgt_text: hetshi tshi tou vha tshitzhili tshine tshi kavha vhathu vha tshaka dzoṱhe.

src_text: let us lower the wing of compassion to those who are infected, and to those who have returned home from highrisk countries.
tgt_text: kha ri vhe na pfelovhuṱungu kha avho vho kavhiwaho, na kha avho vho vhuyaho u bva mashangoni a re na tshutshedzo khulwanesa.

src_text: let us assist those in need and those more vulnerable, instead of shunning them.
tgt_text: kha ri thuse avho vhane vha khou ṱoḓa thuso na vhashayatsireledzo, madzuloni a u vha valela nnḓa.

src_text: we will remain faithful to the values of tolerance and respect that define us as a people.
tgt_text: ri ḓo dzula ri tshi khou fulufhedzea kha zwa ndeme zwa u konḓelelana na ṱhompho ine ya amba uri ri vhonnyi sa vhathu.

src_text: on behalf of all the people of south africa i thank the team who repatriated our compatriots from wuhan, china, as well as the leadership and people of limpopo who are assisting with the quarantine process.
tgt_text: ndo imela vhathu vha afrika tshipembe, ndi livhuwa tshigwada tshe tsha vhuisa vhaṅwe nga riṋe u bva ngei wuhan, china, khathihi na vhurangaphanḓa na vhathu vha limpopo vhane vha khou thusa nga fhethu ha u valela vhathu u thivhela u phaḓalala ha vhulwadze.

src_text: this is a difficult time.
tgt_text: ndi zwifhinga zwi konḓaho.

src_text: and yet it is in times of adversity that our strength is revealed.
tgt_text: honeha, ndi kha zwifhinga zwi lemelaho hune nungo dzashu dza dzumbululea.

src_text: we will act decisively, with determination and with purpose.
tgt_text: ri ḓo dzhia tsheo nga u ṱavhanya, ri na ndivho na u ḓiimisela .

src_text: we will act as a collective, for it is upon the actions of every south african that the success of our efforts depend.
tgt_text: ri ḓo shuma sa ṅanda, sa izwi u bvelela ha ndingedzo dzashu ho ḓisendeka kha nyito dza muafrika tshipembe muṅwe na muṅwe.

src_text: the thuma mina moment is upon us, perhaps as never before.
tgt_text: tshifhinga tsha thuma mina tshi kha riṋe, huṅwe ṱhaṅwe na u fhira mathomoni.

src_text: this too shall pass.
tgt_text: hezwi na zwone zwi ḓo fhira.

src_text: we shall overcome.
tgt_text: ri ḓo kunda.

src_text: we are south africans.
tgt_text: ri roṱhe ri nga kona u lwa na masiandaitwa a covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed ḽifhasi ḽi khou ṱangana na vhuleme vhuhulu ha tshiimo tsha shishi kha mutakalo wa lushaka nga nḓila ine a i athu vhonwa kha miṅwaha i fhiraho ḓana.

src_text: help for our vulnerable citizens vukuzenzele unnamed many countries around the world have imposed coronavirus lockdowns with a view to saving the lives of their citizens.
tgt_text: thusedzo ya vhadzulapo vhashu vha sa koni u ḓi tsireledza vukuzenzele unnamed mashango manzhi u mona na ḽifhasi a kha nyiledzo dza u tshimbila nga ṅwambo wa khoronavairasi a tshi khou itela u tshidza matshilo a vhathu vhao.

src_text: we have done the same in our country, but our lockdown has revealed a very sad fault line in our society that reveals how grinding poverty, inequality and unemployment is tearing the fabric of our communities apart.
tgt_text: ro ita zwenezwo na kha shango ḽashu, fhedzi zwa nyiledzo dza u tshimbila kha riṋe zwo dzumbulula zwithu zwi vhaisaho vhukuma zwitshavhani zwashu zwe zwa dzumbulula uri vhushai vhuhulu, tshayandingano na vhushayamushumo zwi khou ṱhukhukanya mvumbo ya vhadzulapo vhashu.

src_text: there can be no greater anguish than that of a parent whose children cry out to them for food, but they have none to give.
tgt_text: a hu na vhuṱungu vhuhulu vhu fanaho na uho ha vhabebi vhane vhana vhavho vha lilela zwiḽiwa, fhedzi vha vha vha si na zwine vha nga vha fha.

src_text: there can be no greater injustice than a society where some live in comfort and plenty, while others struggle at the margins to survive with little or nothing at all.
tgt_text: a hu nga vhi na khaṱhulo i si kwayo vhukuma u fana na tshitshavha tshine vhaṅwe vha dzula kha vhukimvi, ngeno vhaṅwe vha tshi khou tambula u swika lufuni uri vha kone u tshila nga zwiṱuku kana vha si na tshithu na tshithihi.

src_text: yes, these are the residual effects of a fractured and unequal past.
tgt_text: ndi zwone, izwi ndi zwithu zwi sa thivhelei zwo vhangwaho nga ḓivhazwakale ya tshaya ndingano nahone yo tshinyadzaho vhukuma.

src_text: but they are also a symp tom of a fundamental failing in our postapartheid society.
tgt_text: fhedzi hu na ngafhadzo dza u balelwa huhulu kha tshitshavha tshashu tshe kale tsha vha tshi kha khethululo nga lukanda.

src_text: the nationwide lockdown in response to the coronavirus has gravely exarcerbated a longstanding problem.
tgt_text: nyiledzo dza u tshimbila dzi angaredzaho shango ḽoṱhe ho sedzwa khoronavairasi dzo ṋaṋisa zwihulusa thaidzo ye ya vha i hone u bva kale.

src_text: over the past few weeks, we have been confronted with distressing images of desperate people clamouring for food parcels at distribution centres and of community protests against food shortages.
tgt_text: kha vhege dzo fhiraho, ro vha ro livhana na zwifhaṱuwo zwi vhaisaho zwa vhathu vho hanganeaho vha tshi khou gwalabela zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa sentharani dza u phakhela na migwalabo ya vhadzulapo vha tshi lwela u ṱahela ha zwiḽiwa.

src_text: we have also had to contend with allegations both disturbing and disgusting.
tgt_text: ro dovha hafhu ra tea u livhana na mavharivhari a sa ṱanganedzei nahone a vhaisaho.

src_text: a number of provinces have received reports that callous individuals, some of them allegedly government officials, are hoarding or selling food parcels earmarked for the needy and destitute, or diverting them to their friends and families.
tgt_text: mavundu a tshivhalo o ṱanganedza mivhigo ya uri vhathu vha si na mbilu dza u vhavhalela, hune vhaṅwe vhavho vha vha vhaofisiri vha muvhuso, vha khou dzumba kana u rengisa zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa zwo vhetshelwaho vhashayi na vhathu vha si na tshithu, kana vha khou zwi isa kha khonani dzavho na kha miṱa yavho.

src_text: if there is found to be substance to these allegations we will deal with the individuals concerned harshly.
tgt_text: arali ha wanala hu na zwi fareaho vhukuma kha mavharivhari aya ri ḓo shumana na vhathu avho lu vhavhaho vhukuma.

src_text: with the declaration of a national state of disaster and the imposition of a nationwide lockdown we entered uncharted waters.
tgt_text: u bviswa ha mulevho wa tshiimo tsha tshiwo tsha lushaka na khombetshedzo ya nyiledzo dza u tshimbila kha shango ḽoṱhe ro dzhena kha nyimele ye ra vha ri sa athu i tshenzhema.

src_text: south africa has never had to deal with a public health emergency of this magnitude.
