src_text: black economic empowerment a must for growth vukuzenzele unnamed in april this year, a landmark broadbased black economic empowerment transaction was concluded in the eastern cape that significantly improves the participation of black womenowned businesses in the energy sector.
tgt_text: maitele a u maanḓafhadza vharema siani ḽa ikonomi a tou vha khombekhombe u itela nyaluwo vukuzenzele unnamed nga ṅwedzi wa lamba mai uno ṅwaha, ho vha na u phule tshedza zwihulwane musi hu tshi sainwa thendelano ya u maanḓafhadza vharema kha zwa ikonomi ngei vunḓuni ḽa kapa vhubvaḓuvha, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo shandukisa vhukuma nḓila dza u shela mulenzhe ha ma bindu o rangwaho phanḓa nga vhafumakadzi vha vharema kha sekhithara ya zwa fulufulu.

src_text: a liquid bulk fuel terminal operated by bp southern africa in east london has been sold to wasaa, an independent petrochemicals company.
tgt_text: tshomedzo dza hune ha ende dzwa muhwalo wa zwivhaswa zwa tshiluḓi dzi langwaho nga vha khamphani ya bp ya tshipembe ha afrika dzi wanala ho ngei east london dzo rengi selwa vha ha wasaa, ine ya vha khamphani yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe i vhumbaho zwibvele dzwa zwa khemikhaḽa u bva kha pheṱhiroḽiamu na gese.

src_text: wasaa has acquired all the terminal’s moveable assets and a 20 percent share in berthtoterminal pipelines.
tgt_text: wasaa yo renga ndaka yoṱhe i sudzu luseaho ine ya vha hone afho kha tshomedzo dza u endedza zwivhaswa khathihi na mikovhe ya 20% i re kha phaiphi dzi no bva afho hune zwikepe zwa ima hone dzi tshi ya kha tshomedzo dza hune zwivhaswa zwa endedzwa zwi tshi bva hone.

src_text: with the 2020 report by the broadbased black economic empowerment commission showing that most economic sectors are falling short of their black women ownership targets, this acquisition by a black and femaleowned company of a liquid fuel terminal is a historic development.
tgt_text: musi muvhigo wa ṅwaha wa 2020 wa khomishini ya zwa u maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema ho angalalaho siani ḽa zwa ikonomi u tshi khou sumbedza uri vhunzhi ha sekhithara dza zwa ikonomi dzi khou kundelwa u swikela zwipikwa zwadzo zwa u maanḓafhadza vhafumakadzi vha vharema kha u vha vhone vhaṋe vha mabindu, izwi zwa u rengwa ha tshomedzo dza fhethu ha u endedza zwivhaswa zwa tshiluḓi nga khamphani iyi ya murema nahone wa mufumakadzi, zwi tou vha mafhungo ane a tou vha ḓivhazwikale.

src_text: it contributes to our national effort to redress inequality and ensure there is meaningful participation by the country’s majority in our economy.
tgt_text: zwi dovha hafhu zwa thusa kha ndingedzo dzashu sa lu shaka dza u tandulula thaidzo ya u sa lingana khathihi na u vhona uri vhunzhi ha vhathu vha shango ḽashu vha khou kona u shela mulenzhe kha ikonomi yashu nga nḓila i pfalaho.

src_text: recently, i announced the appointment of the new broadbased black economic empowerment advisory council, which comprises government, business, labour and other stakeholders.
tgt_text: ndi kha ḓi tou bva u ḓivhadza u tholwa ha khorongele tshedzi ya u maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema ho angalalaho siani ḽa ikonomi ine ya kha ḓi tou vha ntswa yo vhumbwaho nga vha muvhuso, mabindu, vhashumi khathihi na zwiṅwe zwiimiswa.

src_text: it was established to champion the cause of economic transformation.
tgt_text: yo vhumbelwa uri i vhe yone ine ya ranga phanḓa na u tshimbidza zwa tshanduko ya zwa ikonomi.

src_text: the council has its origins in a 2001 report produced by the bee commission.
tgt_text: khoro iyi yo thoma u dzi nginywa kha muvhigo wa khomi shini ya bee nga ṅwaha wa 2001. muvhigo uyu wone wo vha hone nga murahu ha musi ho itwa ṱhoḓisiso dzo angalalaho nga ha tshivhumbeo tsha ikonomi ya afrika tshipembe khathihi na nga ha zwine zwa ṱoḓea u itela u shandukisa ikonomi, u alusa vhoramabindu vha vharema, u ita uri hu vhe na mabindu manzhi a langwaho khathihi na u vha nga fhasi ha vhuṋe ha vharema hu tshi katelwa na u ita uri vhafumakadzi vha vharema na vhone vha dzhene kha ikonomi khu lwane.

src_text: this report emanated from an extensive study into the structure of the south african economy, and what was needed to transform the economy, grow black entrepreneurship, ensure greater black management and ownership of busines ses, and bring black women into the mainstream of the economy.
tgt_text: ṅwaha u ḓaho, hu ḓo vha hu tshi khou fhela miṅwaha ya fu mbili u tou bva tshe mulayo wa u maanḓafhadzwa lwo angalalaho ha vharema siani ḽa ikonomi (bbbee), une wa vha wone we wa vhumba khoro iyi wo phasiswa.

src_text: next year, it will be two decades since the broadbased black economic empowerment (bbbee) act – which established the council – was passed.
tgt_text: vhuḓiimiseli hashu kha u khwaṱhisa na u khwiṋisa zwa u maanḓafhadzwa siani ḽa zwa ikonomi a vhu khou thengathenga.

src_text: our commitment to entrench and deepen economic empowerment is unwavering.
tgt_text: ndi gazwo zwa u maanḓafha dzwa ha vharemi siani ḽa ikonomi zwi tshi tou vha tshipiḓa tsha ndeme tsha u vusuluswa na u vhuedzedzwa ha ikonomi yashu nga murahu ha dwadze ḽa covid19.

src_text: that is why black economic empowerment is an integral part of our economic reconstruction and recovery in the wake of the covid19 pandemic.
tgt_text: heyi ndi iṅwe ya pfulufhe dziso dze nda dzi ita musi ndi tshi khou amba na vha khoro ya mabindu a vharema mathomoni a ṅwedzi wo fhelaho he ra amba nga ha nyimele ya bbbee kha ḽino shango, mvelaphanḓa yo no swike lwaho khathihi na zwine ra tea u ita roṱhe ro ṱangana u itela u engedza kha zwe ra zwi swikela u swika zwino.

src_text: this is one of the reassurances i articulated to the black business council earlier last month, where we discussed the state of bbbee in the country, the progress that has been made and what we need to do as a collective to build on our gains.
tgt_text: naho ho vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane ye ya swikelwa kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya fu mbili yo fhiraho, hu kha ḓi vha na huṅwe fhethu he ha vha na u humela murahu.

src_text: while there has been significant progress over the last two decades, there are some areas where there has been regression.
tgt_text: ho vha na u humela murahu musi zwi tshi ḓa kha u engedza kulangele kwa ndangulo ya vharema, u khwinifhadza mveledziso ya zwikili, u khwaṱhisa mvele dziso ya mabindu khathihi na u ṱanḓavhudza zwa u renga thundu na tshumelo dza muvhuso hu tshi itelwa u ṋea zwikhala vhafumakadzi vha vharema khathihi na vhaswa.

src_text: we have gone backwards when it comes to increasing black management control, upscaling skills development, entrenching enterprise deve lopment and broadening procurement to give opportunities to black women and the youth.
tgt_text: muvhuso wa tshiṱalula wo bveledza ikonomi yo khakhe aho ye ya vha yo sendamela lu rumbu luthihi u itela u vhuedza vhatshena.

src_text: the apartheid government deliberately built a distorted economy designed to benefit white people.
tgt_text: vhunzhi ha vhadzulapo vha afrika tshipembe vho vha vho khethululwa u bva kha ikonomi khulwane, he vhoramabindu vha vharema vha vha vho te tshelwa u vha kha nḓowetshumo dza mabindu maṱuku fhedzi ngei zwikolobulasini.

src_text: the majority of south africans were marginalised from the mainstream economy, with black entrepreneurs confined to small retail industries in the townships.
tgt_text: mafheloni a muvhuso wa tshiṱalula, khamphani dze dza vha dzo ṅwaliswa kha jse dze vhaṋe vhadzo vha vha vhe vharema dzo vha dzi fhasi ha phesenthe nthihi.

src_text: at the end of apartheid, black ownership of jselisted companies was less than 1 percent.
tgt_text: hetshi tshivhalo a tsho ngo sha nduka nga u tou ralo kha miṅwaha ya 28 yo fhelaho.

src_text: this figure has not improved much in the past 28 years.
tgt_text: nga tshenetsho tshifhinga tshithihi, ho ḓi vha na maga a ndeme u bva kha sekhi thara ya phuraivethe khathihi na vhuṅwe vhukando nga muvhuso ha u ṱuṱuwedza zwa u shela mulenzhe ha vharema kha ikonomi nga nḓila i pfalaho.

src_text: at the same time, there have been important private sector initiatives and deliberate measures by the state to facilitate greater and more meaningful participation of black people in the economy.
tgt_text: vhukati ha ṅwaha wa 2017 na wa 2020, ho vha na khu mbelo dza u maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema dzi swikaho 500 dze dza swikiswa hu tshi itelwa u ḓiṅwalisa kha vha khomishini ya bbbee.

src_text: between 2017 and 2020, nearly 500 empowerment transactions were submitted for registration to the bbbee commission.
tgt_text: kha sekhithara dza ndeme u fana na nḓowetshumo ya zwa u fhaṱa, ya ndaka, thekhinoḽodzhi ya mafhungo na vhudavhi dzani, vhuendelamashango na vhuendi, vhuṋe ha mabindu ha vharema ho no fhirisa zwe zwa vha zwo lavhelelwa.

src_text: in key sectors such as construction, property, information and communications technology, tourism and transport, black ownership has exceeded targets.
tgt_text: tshanduko ya ikonomi khathihi na nyaluwo ya ikonomi ndi tshithu tshithihi.

src_text: economic transformation and economic growth are intertwined.
tgt_text: vhukati hazwo, a hu na tshine tsha nga kona u vha hone arali tshiṅwe tshazwo tshi siho.

src_text: there cannot be one without the other.
tgt_text: nga u dzhenisa zwa tsha nduko kha maitele a u bveledza nḓowetshumo, ri vha ri tshi khou bveledza ḽiedza ḽa nyaluwo yo ṱanganelaho ḽine ḽa kovhekanya lupfumo u fhirisa uri lu vhe fhethu huthihi.

src_text: by integrating transformation into the process of industrialisation, we are advancing a more inclusive growth model that shares, rather than concentrates, wealth.
tgt_text: muhasho wa mbambadzo, nḓowetshumo na muṱaṱisano (dtic) u khou bvela phanḓa na hetshi tshipikwa nga kha mbeka nyamushumo dzo fhambanaho.

src_text: the department of trade, industry and competition (dtic) is pursuing this goal through various programmes.
tgt_text: hedzi ndi dzine dza katela mbe kanyamushumo ya u tikedza ma bindu a vhupo ha zwikolobulasi, vhupfumbudzi ha mabindu a vha rema, vhafumakadzi na a vhaswa kha zwa u rengiselana na ma shango a nnḓa nga vha koporasi ya mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo (idc) khathihi na mugaganya gwama wo engedzwaho wa themamveledziso kha dzismme dzi re kha vhupo ha ikonomi ho khe theaho ha tshwane.

src_text: they include a support programme for township businesses, exportrelated training by the industrial development corporation (idc) to black, women and youthowned businesses, and increased infrastructure budget to smmes in the tshwane special economic zone.
tgt_text: nga u shumisa puḽane khu lwane dzo fhambanaho dza sekhithara, ri khou kona u ṱuṱuwedza vhubindudzi hapo vhune ha vhuedza mabi ndu a vharema.

src_text: through sectoral masterplans we are driving localisation that benefits black owned businesses.
tgt_text: sa tsumbo, ho bveledzwa vhafuwi vha 10 vha vharema hu tshi shumiswa mashe leni a linganaho r366 miḽioni sa tshipiḓa tsha puḽane khulwane ya u fuwa khuhu.

src_text: for example, 10 black contract growers have been established with an investment of r336 million as part of the poultry masterplan.
tgt_text: muvhuso wo dovha hafhu wa rwela ṱari netiweke ya vharema vhane vha rengiselana na mashango a nnḓa ine netiweke yeneyi ya ḓo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganya khamphani dza vharema kha zwa zwiḽiwa, zwibveledzwa zwa vhuinzhiniere, dziphatsi dza mimoḓoro, zwibveledzwa zwa lunako khathihi na dziṅwe se khithara dza ikonomi.

src_text: government has also launched a black exporters network that will connect blackowned companies in food, engineering products, auto components, beauty products and other sectors of the economy.
tgt_text: sa tshipiḓa tsha fulo ḽashu ḽa u bveledza murafho muswa wa vhoranḓowetshumo vha vharema, ṅwaha wo fhelaho muvhuso wo tendela u shumiswa ha masheleni a linganaho r2.5 biḽioni kha thikedzo ntswa ya u tikedza vhoranḓowetshumo vha vharema vha swikaho 180 nga u vha ṋea khadzimiso ya masheleni u bva kha vha idc khathihi na vha tshi kwama tsha u maanḓafhadza tsha lushaka (nef) hu tshi katelwa na magavhelo a bvaho kha tshikimu tsha zwa magavhelo tsha dtic kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha miraru i ḓaho, ho dovha hafhu ha fhulufhe dziswa maṅwe masheleni a linga naho r21 biḽioni nga vha idc, nef khathihi na zwiṅwe zwiimiswa u itela u tikedza vhoranḓowetshumo vha vharema.

src_text: as part of our drive to create a new generation of black industrialists, last year government approved r2.5 billion in new support to about 180 black industrialists in the form of loans from the idc and national empowerment fund (nef) and grants from the dtic incentive scheme.
tgt_text: maṅwe masheleni a u ḓadzisa a linganaho r25 biḽioni o dovha hafhu a fhulufhedziswa uri a ḓo shumiswa kha u tikedza khamphani dza vharema, vhafumakadzi, vhaswa khathihi na dza vhashumi.

src_text: over the next three years a further r21 billion has been committed by the idc, nef and other institutions to support black industrialists.
tgt_text: zwi tou vha khagala uri hu kha ḓi vha na mushumo mnzhi une wa kha ḓi tea u itwa u itela u tandulula khaedu nnzhi dzine mabindu a vharema a kha di ṱangana nadzo.

src_text: an additional r25 billion has been committed to support black, women, youth and workerowned companies.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi katela u konḓelwa u wana masheleni a u thoma na u alusa bindu khathihi na u kunde lwa ha dzismme u wana maraga ya zwibveledzwa zwavho.

src_text: it is clear that much more work needs to be done to address the many challenges that black businesses face.
tgt_text: mabindu a vhafumakadzi vha vharema ndi one ane kanzhi a konḓelwa u wana thendelano khu lwane dza zwa u maanḓafhadzwa.

src_text: this includes the difficulty of accessing startup and expansion capital and the ability of smmes to find markets for their products.
tgt_text: zwa u fhelisa maitele a mveledziso i songo fhelelaho nga u maanḓafhadza vharema siani ḽa ikonomi a zwi sokou tou vha fhedzi zwithu zwo teaho u itiwa, zwi dovha hafhu zwa vha zwithu zwi pfalaho kha zwa mabindu.

src_text: black womenowned businesses, in particular, encounter difficulties in taking on largescale empowerment transactions.
tgt_text: zwa u dzulela u khethululwa ha vharema nga vhunzhi kha ikonomi khulwane, zwi hoṱefhadza nyaluwo ya ikonomi, zwine hezwi zwa fhedza zwo kwama mabindu oṱhe nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi.

src_text: breaking the cycle of underdevelopment through black economic empowerment is not just a moral imperative; it also makes business sense.
tgt_text: u engedza tshivhalo tsha vhora mabindu kha ḽino shango ndi zwa ndeme kha nyaluwo.

src_text: the continued exclusion of the black majority from the economy’s mainstream constrains economic growth, which ultimately impacts all business.
tgt_text: roṱhe ri na vhuḓifhinduleli vhu fanaho ha u ṱuṱuwedza ndingedzo dza u khwaṱhisa bbbee ngauri yo itelwa u fhelisa zwa u sa lingana.

src_text: expanding the country’s entrepreneurial base is fundamental to growth.
tgt_text: ikonomi dzine dza si vhe na ndi ngano dzi bveledza zwitshavha zwi sa lingani, ngeno zwitshavha zwi sa lingani zwi si na nyaluwo na mvelaphanḓa.

src_text: we have a shared responsibility to drive the effort to entrench bbbee because it is about eradicating inequality.
tgt_text: a zwo ngo tou khakhea fhedzi, zwi dovha hafhu zwa vha zwithu zwine ra nga si kone u bvela phanḓa nazwo zwauri mabindu a bvele phanḓa na u vha nga fhasi ha vhuṋe na ndangulo ya vhatshena kana vhathu vha vhanna.

src_text: unequal economies breed unequal societies, and unequal societies don’t grow and flourish.
tgt_text: nahone ndi vhadzulapo vha afrika tshipembe vhane vha vha vhone vharengi vhahulwanesa vha thundu na tshumelo dzavho.

src_text: it is not only wrong, but also unsustainable, for businesses to keep their management and ownership structures mostly white or male.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi tea u vhonala kha u ṱanganelana ha vhatholiwa u ya nga u fhambana ha mvelele dzavho khathihi na kha maitele a vhula nguli, kha vhuṋe ha mabindu na musi hu tshi rengiwa thundu na tshumelo.

src_text: it is, after all, the south african public that are the primary consumers of their goods and services.
tgt_text: zwa u maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema ho angalalaho kha ikonomi zwi ḓo kona u swikelwa fhedzi nga kha tshumisano khathihi na vhuḓiimiseli vhu fanaho kha zwa u ḓisa tsha nduko.

src_text: this should be reflected in diversity of hiring and management practices, in ownership and in procurement.
tgt_text: zwa u tholwa ha khoro ntswa ya bbbee zwi ḓo ri thusa kha u ṱanḓavhudza mikaṋo ya u maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema ho angalalaho kha ikonomi.

src_text: broadbased black economic empowerment will only be achieved through partnership and a shared commitment to transformation.
tgt_text: maitele a u maanḓafhadza vharema siani ḽa ikonomi a tou vha khombekhombe u itela nyaluwo vukuzenzele unnamed nga ṅwedzi wa lamba mai uno ṅwaha, ho vha na u phule tshedza zwihulwane musi hu tshi sainwa thendelano ya u maanḓafhadza vharema kha zwa ikonomi ngei vunḓuni ḽa kapa vhubvaḓuvha, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo shandukisa vhukuma nḓila dza u shela mulenzhe ha ma bindu o rangwaho phanḓa nga vhafumakadzi vha vharema kha sekhithara ya zwa fulufulu.

src_text: rising cost of living calls for a united response over the past few months, south african consumers have been hit by steep price increases that have dramatically affected their quality of life.
tgt_text: zwa u engedzea ha mitengo ya zwirengwa ndi fhungo ḽine roṱhe ra tea u ḓidzhenisa khaḽo kha miṅwedzi i si gathi yo fhiraho, vharengi vha afrika tshipembe vho vhona hu tshi vha na u engedzea vhukuma ha mitengo ya zwirengwa nga nḓila ye zwa fhedza zwi tshi kwama matshilele avho nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi.

src_text: it has become increasingly more expensive to buy food and other essentials, to pay for basic services and to use public or private transportation.
tgt_text: zwi vho ḓura vhukuma u renga zwiḽiwa khathihi na zwiṅwe zwishumiswa zwa ndeme, u badela tshumelo dza mutheo hu tshi katelwa na u shumisa vhuendi ha phuraivethe kana ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: while these rising costs affect everyone, lowincome households are feeling them the most.
tgt_text: naho uhu u engedzea ha mitengo hu tshi kwama muthu muṅwe na muṅwe, miṱa ine ya wana mbuelo dza fhasi ndi yone ye ya kwamea vhukuma.

src_text: the latest consumer price index for april 2022 published by stats sa shows there has been little respite for hardpressed south africans.
tgt_text: tsumbamutengo wa vharengi ya zwenezwino ya ṅwedzi wa lambamai 2022 ye ya anḓadzwa nga stats sa yo sumbedza uri ho vha na u femuluwa zwiṱuku kha vhathu vha afrika tshipembe vhane vho tsikeledzea nga mitengo iyi.

src_text: food inflation was recorded at 6.2 per cent.
tgt_text: tshanduko kha mitengo ya zwiḽiwa yo rekhodiwa u vha henefha kha phesenthe dza 6.2. vhunzhi ha zwiḽiwa zwa nga misi zwi vho ḓura vhukuma u fhira ṅwaha wo fhiraho, ngeno zwiḽiwa zwi shumiswaho misi yoṱhe u fana na mapfhura a u bika zwo vha na nyengedzedzo ya mitengo i re nṱha vhukuma.

src_text: the most basic foodstuffs cost more than a year ago, with staples like cooking oil recording the highest increases.
tgt_text: mutengo wa zwivhaswa, une wa kwama mitengo ya tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe, wo engedzwa kararu kha miṅwedzi ya fumimbili yo fhelaho u vhuya u swikela mafheloni a ṅwedzi wa ṱhafamuhwe 2022. afrika tshipembe a ḽi ḽoṱhe kha hezwi.

src_text: the price of fuel, which affects the price of almost everything else, has risen by a third in the twelve months to march 2022. south africa is not alone in this regard.
tgt_text: ṱhoḓisiso dzine dza kha ḓi tou bva u anḓadzwa zwenezwino dza vha foramu ya ikonomi ya ḽifhasi dzo sumbedza uri vhathu vha tshivhalo tshi linganaho kotara ya vhathu vhoṱhe ḽifhasini, hu tshi katelwa na avho vha re kha mashango a re na ikonomi yo bvelelaho, vha khou konḓelwa vhukuma siani ḽa zwa masheleni nga mulandu wa u engedzea ha mitengo ya zwirengwa.

src_text: a recently published poll for the world economic forum shows that nearly a quarter of people globally, including those in developed economies, are struggling financially due to rising prices.
tgt_text: u engedzea uhu ha mitengo ya zwirengwa, nga maanḓa mutengo wa zwivhaswa, ho vhangwa nga mulandu wa zwithu zwine ra sa tou vha na ndango khazwo.

src_text: these increases, particularly the price of fuel, are the consequence of events over which we have little control.
tgt_text: nndwa ine ya khou bvela phanḓa vhukati ha shango ḽa russia na ḽa ukraine yo vha na masiandaitwa mahulwane kha mutengo wa zwivhaswa na zwiḽiwa.

src_text: the ongoing conflict between russia and ukraine has had a significant impact on the price of fuel and food.
tgt_text: mashango aya vhuvhili hao ndi one ane a vha vhavhambadzi vhahulwane kha mimaraga ya ḽifhasi vha manyoro, thanga dza u bveledza ole ine ya ṱoḓea kha u bveledza zwithu zwo fhambanaho u fana na mapfura a u bika.

src_text: both countries are major exporters to international markets of fertilisers, grains and oilseeds that are needed for a range of items such as cooking oil.
tgt_text: tshiṅwe tshiitisi ho vha u tsela fhasi ha zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi nga mulandu wa zwiwo zwa mutsho zwo kalulaho zwe zwa vhangwa nga tshanduko ya kilima u fana na miḓalo na gomelelo.

src_text: another factor is lower agricultural output due to extreme weather events caused by climate change, such as flooding and droughts.
tgt_text: naho vhunzhi ha zwiwo izwi zwi si zwine ra nga kona u zwi langa, muvhuso u khou ita zwoṱhe zwine wa nga kona u itela u tsireledza vhadzulapo vha afrika tshipembe kha u engedzea ha mitengo ha zwino na ha tshifhiga tshi ḓaho.

src_text: while many of these events are beyond our control, government is doing what it can to shield the south african from current and future price increases.
tgt_text: tshiṅwe tshithu tshine tsha vha tshavhuḓisa kha shango ḽashu, ndi u vha na bannga ya vhukati yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe nahone yo khwaṱhaho ye ya zwi kona u dzudza tshanduko ya mitengo i kha tshiimo tsha fhasi nahone tsho lavhelelwaho, tshine tsha vha fhasisa kha zwine vhunzhi ha maṅwe mashango a khou ṱangana nazwo.

src_text: one of our greatest advantages as a country is a strong, independent reserve bank that has managed to keep inflation within a narrow target range, well below what many other countries are experiencing.
tgt_text: ri kha ḓi tou bva u ḓivhadza uri muthelo wa mutengo wa zwivhaswa u ḓo dovha hafhu wa vha wo fhahewa lwa tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi mivhili u swikela nga ṅwedzi wa ṱhangule, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo vha na ṱhadulo khulwane kha miṱa.

src_text: we recently announced that the fuel levy will be suspended for another two months to august, which will bring some relief to households.
tgt_text: uhu u fhahewa ha muthelo wa mutengo wa zwivhaswa ho ḓisa ṱhaḓulo khulwane kha vhadzulapo vha afrika tshipembe u bva tshe ha thoma u ḓivhadzwa nga ṅwedzi wa lambamai.

src_text: the suspension of the levy has provided essential relief to south africans since it began in april.
tgt_text: sa izwi u fhahewa uhu ha muthelo wa mutengo wa zwivhaswa hu tshi ḓo ḓisa khaedu khulwane kha masheleni a muvhuso, zwine zwenezwo zwa ḓo fhedza nga u kwama dziṅwe mbekanyamushumo dza muvhuso, zwi ḓo konḓa u bvela nazwo u ya nga hu sa fheli.

src_text: since the suspension of the levy comes at a significant cost to public finances, which affects other programmes of government, it will be difficult to continue this indefinitely.
tgt_text: fhedziha, naho zwo ralo, hu ḓi vha na zwiṅwe zwine ra nga ita.

src_text: there are, however, other things we can do.
tgt_text: u khwinisa vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa kha shango ḽashu ndi zwa ndeme u itela u imedzana na zwiwo izwi khathihi na zwiṅwe zwi ḓaho.

src_text: improving our nation’s food security is vital to withstanding this and future shocks.
tgt_text: ri na sekithara dzo khwaṱhaho dza zwa vhulimi dzine dza khou bvela phanḓa, u aluwa khathihi na u sika mishumo.

src_text: we have a strong agricultural sector that continues to grow and create jobs.
tgt_text: u itela u engedza hafhu vhubveledzisi kha zwa vhulimi khathihi na u khwaṱhisa ndangulo yashu ya zwa zwiḽiwa, ri khou ḓidzhenisa tshoṱhe kha zwa u khwinifhadza vhubveledzi hapo, u tikedza vhalimi vha zwa makwevho khathihi na vhalimi vhaṱuku hu tshi katelwa na u thusa vhathu vhanzhi uri vha kone u ḓilimela zwiḽiwa zwavho vhone vhaṋe.

src_text: to further increase agricultural production and strengthen our food sovereignty, we are investing heavily in improving local capacity, supporting commercial and smallscale farmers alike and helping more people to grow their own food.
tgt_text: nga kha mbekanyamushumo ya thikhedzo ya zwa mishumo ya phresidennde, ho ṋetshedzwa vautshara dza u renga kha vhalimivhafuwi vhaṱuku vha fhiraho 65 000, nahone mushumo u kati wa u lingedza u swikela vhalimivhafuwi vho raloho vha swikaho 250 000. muvhuso u khou dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza manyoro na zwiṅwe zwishumiswa zwa u bveledza zwiḽiwa khathihi na u thusa vhalimivhafuwi nga zwigwada kana nga muthihi nga muthihi uri vha kone u ḓithomela ngade dzavho dza zwiḽiwa.

src_text: through the presidential employment stimulus, input vouchers have been given to over 65,000 smallholder farmers, and work is underway to reach 250,000 such farmers.
tgt_text: kha mavundu a fanaho na ḽa north west, vhalimivhafuwi vhaṱuku vha khou tikedzwa nga zwishumiswa zwa vhulimi zwi fanaho na zwiraba khathihi na zwikukwana, nga tshumisano na vha magudedzi apo a zwa vhulimi.

src_text: government is also providing subsistence farmers with fertilisers and equipment to produce food, and helping groups or individuals to start their own food gardens.
tgt_text: nga u shumisa puḽane ya u ḓiwanela mavu yo khwaṱhaho khathihi na u ṋetshedzwa ha mavu a muvhuso hu tshi itelwa zwa vhulimivhufuwi, ri khou tikedza vhunzhi ha vhalimi vhaṱuku uri vha kone u alusa mabindu avho khathihi na u ita uri a vhe mabindu a shumaho zwavhuḓi kha zwa makwevho.

src_text: in provinces like north west, smallscale farmers are supported with agricultural ‘starterpacks’ of seedlings and poultry, in partnership with local agricultural colleges.
tgt_text: ri khou dovha hafhu ra sedzesa na kha zwa u thoma vhushumisani vhunzhi vhukati ha zwiimiswa zwa phuraivethe na zwa muvhuso u itela u tikedza nyaluwo ya vhulimivhufuwi ha zwa makwevho kha vharema nga u shumisa maga a fanaho na vhashumisani kha thandululo ya mavu a zwa vhulimivhufuwi.

src_text: through the proactive land acquisition strategy and the release of stateowned land for agriculture, we are supporting more smallscale farmers to expand their businesses and make them commercially successful.
tgt_text: u itela u khwaṱhisedza maga a tsiravhulwadze khathihi na u tsireledza mutakalo wa zwifuwo kha malwadze a ngaho a khwanḓa na mulomo, ri khou khwaṱhisa maga a u langa kutshimbilele kwa zwifuwo zwashu khathihi na vhukoni ha u bveledza khaelo.

src_text: we are also focusing on establishing more publicprivate partnerships to support the expansion of black commercial farming through initiatives like the partners in agri land solutions and the agricultural development agency.
tgt_text: nga nnḓa ha u maanḓafhadza vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa hapo, sisteme yashu ya magavhelo a zwa matshilisano yo angalalaho khathihi na zwa u bviswa ha mithelo kha zwirengwa zwa ḓuvha na ḓuvha zwi ḓo thusa kha u tsireledza vhashayi kha mitengo i dzulelaho u engedzea.

src_text: to enhance biosecurity and safeguard animal health against diseases like footandmouth, we are strengthening our animal movement control measures and vaccine production capabilities.
tgt_text: nga kha tshumelo dza mutheo dza mahala dzi fanaho na maḓi na muḓagasi dzi ṋetshedzwaho miṱa ya vhaheḓana, ri nga kona u ita uri hu si vhe na muṱa une wa kundelwa u wana tshumelo dza mutheo.

src_text: in addition to boosting local food production, our extensive social grants system and zerorating of basic goods helps to protect the poor from rising costs.
tgt_text: uri ri kone u fhira kha hetshi tshifhinga tshi konḓaho ngaurali, vhathu vhoṱhe vha tea u shela mulenzhe.

src_text: through free basic services like water and electricity for indigent households, we can ensure that no family goes without basic services.
tgt_text: riṋe sa muvhuso zwine ra ḓo ita ndi u bvela phanḓa na u lavhelesa nyimele nga vhuronwane nahone ri ḓo ita zwoṱhe zwine ra nga kona u tsireledza vhadzulapo vha afrika tshipembe kha u engedzea hu songo teaho ha mitengo ya zwirengwa.

src_text: to get through this difficult period, all of society should get involved.
tgt_text: vha mabindu a fhano afrika tshipembe vha tea u vhona uri vharengi a vha khou badeliswa mitengo yo kalulaho ya zwiḽiwa ine a yo ngo tea.

src_text: for our part, government will continue to monitor the situation closely and will do everything within its power to protect south africans from unsustainable increases in the cost of living.
tgt_text: ri khou ṱanganedza zwine zwa khou ambiwa u bva kha vhabveledzi vha zwiḽiwa na vha mavhengele zwa uri vha khou vhea maga a u thusa vharengi uri masheleni avho a kone u vha rengela zwinzhi.

src_text: corporate south africa should ensure that consumers do not pay more for food than they have to.
tgt_text: nga ṅwedzi wa ṱhafamuhwe ṋaṅwaha, khomishini ya miṱaṱisano yo bvisa zwiteṅwa zwine khazwo ha tea u vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi musi hu tshi khou itwa ṱhoḓisiso ya maraga ya zwibveledzwa zwitete.

src_text: we welcome the indications from food manufacturers and retailers that they are putting measures in place to help consumers get more for their money.
tgt_text: yo dzhiela nṱha uri mutengo wa zwibveledzwa zwitete wo vha u khou ḓi dzulela u engedzwa nga tshikalo tsha tshanduko ya mutengo tshi re nṱha, na uri hezwi zwo vha na masiandaitwa ane a sa lingane kha vhashayi.

src_text: in march this year the competition commission released for public comment the terms of reference for a market enquiry into the fresh produce market.
tgt_text: ṱhoḓisiso i ḓo ṱola arali ho vha na vhuṱudzeṱudze kha mushumo wa u bveledza zwiḽiwa he ha fhedza nga u ita uri zwiḽiwa zwi ḓure.

src_text: it noted that the cost of fresh produce has been increasing at aboveinflation levels, and that this has had a disproportionate effect on the poor.
tgt_text: ri ḓo shumisa mbekanyamaitele yashu ya miṱaṱisano u tsireledza vharengi kha u engedzwa ha mitengo nga nḓila i songo teaho khathihi na maitele a lwaho na zwa u ṱaṱisana ha mabindu a itwaho nga vha mabindu, sa zwe ra zwi ita nga tshifhinga tsha dwadze ḽa covid19.

src_text: the inquiry will examine if there are any distortions in the value chain that make food more expensive.
tgt_text: maitele ane a khou bvela phanḓa a u shandukiswa ha milayo kha ikonomi yashu a ḓo tikedza hedzi ndingedzo.

src_text: we will use our competition policy to protect consumers against unjustifiable price increases and anticompetitive practices by businesses, as we did during the covid19 pandemic.
tgt_text: tshanduko kha sekithara dza fulufulu, vhuendi na vhudavhidzani ha ṱhingo ndi maitele o livhiswaho kha u fhungudza mutengo wa muḓagasi, u endedzwa ha thundu na data kha nzudzanyo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu nga kha u ṱaṱisana zwihulwane kha mitengo na mashumele avhuḓi.

src_text: the ongoing process of structural reform of our economy will support these efforts.
tgt_text: ri khou tea u badela masheleni maṱuku, hu si manzhi kha hedzi tshumelo tshifhingani tshi ḓaho.

src_text: reforms in the energy, transport and telecommunications sectors aim to reduce the cost of electricity, logistics and data in the long term through greater competition and efficiency.
tgt_text: zwa u engedzea ha mitengo ya zwirengwa ndi fhungo ḽine roṱhe ra tea u ḓidzhenisa khaḽo kha miṅwedzi i si gathi yo fhiraho, vharengi vha afrika tshipembe vho vhona hu tshi vha na u engedzea vhukuma ha mitengo ya zwirengwa nga nḓila ye zwa fhedza zwi tshi kwama matshilele avho nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi.

src_text: our nation mourns the young lives lost in enyobeni tavern tragedy vukuzenzele unnamed a few weeks ago the families of a township in scenery park outside east london, received news that every parent prays they never get to hear.
tgt_text: shango ḽashu ḽi kha ḓi vha kha malilo a u lilela matshilo a vhaswa vhe vha lovha kha tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela fhaḽa thaveni ya enyobeni vukuzenzele unnamed vhege dzi si gathi dzo fhiraho miṱa ya vhupo ha tshikolobulasi tsha fhaḽa scenery park hune ha vha nnḓa nyana ha ḓorobo ya east london, yo ṱanganedza ma fhungo ane mubebi muṅwe na muṅwe a dzulela u a ra belisa uri ngavhe a sa swiki hune a nga a pfa.

src_text: they were told that 21 of their children had been found dead, in a tavern.
tgt_text: vha miṱa iyi vho ḓivhadzwa uri vhana vhavho vha swikaho 21 vho wanala vho lovha, ngomu thaveni.

src_text: the youngest child was only 13 years old.
tgt_text: ṅwana muṱukusa kha avho vhe vha lovha o vha e na miṅwaha ya 13 fhedzi.

src_text: the police investigation into the tragedy is proceeding apace.
tgt_text: ṱhoḓisiso dza mapholisa nga ha tshiwo itshi tsha makhaulambilu ngaurali dzi khou bvela phanḓa nga luvhilo.

src_text: flowing from the investigations, the buffalo city metro is looking into whether the tavern violated any municipal regulations.
tgt_text: zwiṅwe zwine zwa vha u ḓadzisa kha dzenedzi ṱhoḓisiso, ndi zwauri masipala muhulwane wa buffalo city na wone u khou ita ṱhoḓisiso arali thaveni iyi i tshi nga vha yo pfuka miṅwe ya milayo ya ha masipala.

src_text: our thoughts and prayers are with the families who are struggling to come to terms with this unspeakable horror.
tgt_text: ri khou lila na miṱa iyi ine ya khou kundelwa u ṱanganedza tshiwo itshi tshi shushaho ngaurali khathihi na u vha rabelisa.

src_text: we commend the eastern cape provincial government for assisting the affected families, as well as avbob that has pledged to assist the families with the burials.
tgt_text: ri khoḓa muvhuso wa vunḓu ḽa kapa vhubvaḓuvha nge wa thusa miṱa yo kwameaho khathihi na vha mutshara wa avbob vhe vha fulufhedzisa uri vha ḓo thusa miṱa iyi kha mushumo wa mbulungo.

src_text: even as the relevant authorities deconstruct what happened to ensure there is justice for the victims, there is a conversation we do need to have as a country.
tgt_text: naho vha maanḓalanga o teaho vha tshi khou lingedza u ita ṱhoḓisiso dza zwe zwa itea u itela uri hu kone u dzhiiwa vhukando ha zwa mulayo hu tshi itelwa zwipondwa zwa tshiwo itshi, hu na nyambedzano dzine ra khou tea u vha nadzo sa shango.

src_text: it is the problem of underage drinking.
tgt_text: nyambedzano dzenedzo ndi dza nga ha thaidzo ya vhana vhane vha nwa mahalwa ngeno vha tshi kha ḓi vha vhathu vhaṱuku.

src_text: the footage and images posted online of the socalled ‘pens down’ party at the venue that night show revelling youngsters clutching bottles of alcohol.
tgt_text: vidio na zwifanyiso zwe zwa rumelwa kha inthanethe zwi sumbedzaho izwo zwine zwa vhidzwa u pfi ‘pens down’, vhune ha vha vhuṱambo he ngaho vhagudi avha vha vha vha tshi khou pembelela u fhedza havho u ṅwala milingo khathihi na u vala ha zwikolo henefho thaveni yeneyo vhusiku uho, zwi sumbedza vhaswa vha tshi khou ḓiphina vho fara maboḓelo a mahalwa.

src_text: many of those in the images look barely out of their teens.
tgt_text: vhunzhi havho kha zwifanyiso izwo vha vhonala vha tshi kha ḓi tou vha vhana vhaṱuku vhukuma.

src_text: a number of young people from scenery park have told the media of having seen a post circulated on social media, offering free rounds of alcohol to all who attended the event that night.
tgt_text: vhunzhi ha vhaswa vhane vha bva henefho kha vhupo ha scenery park vho vhudza vhoramafhungo uri vho vhona khunguwedzo ye ya vha i tshi khou leleḓa kha nyanḓadzamafhungo dza matshilisano ye khayo ha vha hu tshi khou fulufhedziswa mahalwa a mahala kha vhoṱhe vhane vha ḓo dzhenela vhuṱambo uho vhusiku honoho.

src_text: the increased social acceptability of young people drinking alcohol has become a serious problem in a country where the majority of the drinking population are already classified by the world health organization as binge drinkers.
tgt_text: zwa u engedzea ha u ṱanganedzwa nga tshitshavha maitele a vhaswa vhane vha khou ḓidzhenisa kha zwa u nwa mahalwa, zwi khou vha thaidzo khulwane vhukuma fhano shangoni hune vhunzhi ha vhadzulapo vhane vha nwa mahalwa u swika zwino vha vho dzhiiwa sa zwidakwa u ya nga dzangano ḽa mutakalo ḽa ḽifhasi.

src_text: alcohol use amongst adolescents is associated with impaired function, absenteeism from learning, alcoholrelated injuries, suicidal thoughts and attempts, and risky behaviour.
tgt_text: zwa u nwa mahalwa nga vhana vha thangana ya murole zwi na vhushaka vhuhulwane na u fhungudzea ha nḓila ya kushumele kana kuitele kwa zwithu, u ḓibvisa kha zwa u guda, mafuvhalo a elanaho na mahalwa, mihumbulo na ndingedzo dza u ṱoḓa u ḓivhulaha khathihi na vhuḓifari vhu re khombo.

src_text: we must come together to combat this vice that is robbing our young people of the best years of their lives, and making them susceptible to alcohol addiction.
tgt_text: ri khou tea u farana u itela u fhelisa hovhu vhuvhi vhune ha khou khakhisa vhaswa vhashu musi vha tshi kha ḓi vha kha miṅwaha yavho ya khwinesa ya matshilo avho khathihi na u ita uri vha tou ḓikumedzela tshoṱhe kha zwa mahalwa.

src_text: as families it means having open and frank conversations about alcohol and setting boundaries.
tgt_text: sa miṱa zwi amba u vha na nyambedzano dzo vhofholowaho nahone dzi re khagala nga ha mahalwa khathihi na u vhea mikaṋo.

src_text: children under the age of 18 consuming alcohol is against the law.
tgt_text: zwa u nwa mahalwa nga vhana vha miṅwaha i re fhasi ha 18 a zwiho mulayoni.

src_text: as adults we should refrain from practices such as sending minors to buy alcohol for us or capitulating to requests to buy these young people alcohol.
tgt_text: sa vhaaluwa ri tea u ḓibvisa kha maitele a fanaho na u ruma vhana vhaṱuku uri vha ye vha ri rengele mahalwa kana u laṱela thaula lune ra vho tenda na u tou rengela havha vhaswa mahalwa.

src_text: it is not the first time we have been confronted with tragic events such as what happened in scenery park last week.
tgt_text: a si lwa u thoma musi ri tshi ṱangana na zwiwo zwa makhaulambilu ngaurali u fana na zwe zwa bvelela fhaḽa scenery park vhege yo fhelaho.

src_text: a common denominator between enyobeni tavern, the throb nightclub disaster in durban in 2000, and the osi’s tavern tragedy in khayelitsha in 2015, is that these establishments were selling liquor to minors.
tgt_text: zwine zwa fana vhukati ha tshiwo itshi tsha afha thaveni ya enyobeni na tsha kiḽabu ya the throb i re ngei ḓoroboni ya durban nga ṅwaha wa 2000 khathihi na makhaulambilu e a bvelela fhaḽa thaveni ya osi’s i re ngei khayelitsha nga ṅwaha wa 2015, ndi tsha uri oṱhe haya mabindu o vha a tshi khou rengisela mahalwa vhana vha ṱuku.

src_text: the proliferation of establishments openly flouting the law points to failings on the part of authorities to enforce regulations.
tgt_text: u engedzea ha tshivhalo tsha mabindu ane a khou tou vunḓa milayo zwi khagala zwi sumbedza u kundelwa ha maanḓalanga kha zwa u kombetshedza u tevhedzwa ha milayo.

src_text: under the national liquor act, owners of establishments with liquor licenses may not sell alcohol to anyone under the age of 18. they must also take reasonable steps to ensure anyone they are selling alcohol to is of age.
tgt_text: nga fhasi ha mulayo wa zwa mahalwa wa lushaka, vhaṋe vha mabindu ayo ane a vha na ḽaisentsi dza halwa a vha tei u rengisela halwa muthu muṅwe na muṅwe ane a vha nga fhasi ha miṅwaha ya 18. vha tea u dovha hafhu vha dzhia maga o teaho a u vhona uri muthu muṅwe na muṅwe ane vha khou mu rengisela halwa u na miṅwaha yo teaho.

src_text: we call on communities to work with authorities to ensure that taverns, shebeens, entertainment venues and outlets breaking the law face the consequences.
tgt_text: ri khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo uri vha shumisane na vha maanḓalanga u itela u vhona uri thaveni, zwipoto zwa u rengisa mahalwa, fhethu ha vhuḓimvumvusi na mabindu ane a khou vunḓa mulayo a khou dzhielwa vhukando ha zwiito zwenezwo.

src_text: we call upon our police to step up the enforcement of laws that prohibit the sale of alcohol close to schools and enhance monitoring of outlets to ensure alcohol is not being sold to minors.
tgt_text: ri khou ita khuwelelo kha mapholisa ashu uri vha engedze maga a u kombetshedza u tevhedzwa ha milayo ine ya thivhela zwa u rengiswa ha mahalwa tsini na zwikolo khathihi na u khwaṱhisa zwa vhulavhelesi ha mabindu o raloho u itela u vhona uri a hu na zwikambi zwine zwa khou rengiselwa vhana vhaṱuku.

src_text: another reality is that alcohol is a form of escapism for young people in communities were opportunities for safe and ageappropriate recreation are few.
tgt_text: iṅwe ngoho ndi ya uri zwikambi zwi tou vha iṅwe ya nḓila dza u ḓimvumvusa ha vhaswa kha zwitshavha zwine khazwo zwikhala zwa vhuḓimvumvusi ho tsireledzeaho nahone vhu elanaho na miṅwaha ya vhaswa vhenevho zwa sa wanale nga vhunzhi.

src_text: the scenery park community has pointed to the lack of sports, learning and other developmental facilities for young people, leading them to resort to ‘tavern hopping’.
tgt_text: tshitshavha tsha fhaḽa scenery park tsho sumbedzisa uri hu na u shayea ha tshomedzo dza zwa mitambo, dza vhugudi khathihi na dziṅwe tshomedzo dza mveledziso ya vhathu vhaswa lune zwa fhedza nga u ita uri vha ḓidzhenise kha zwa u ‘gidimela dzithaveni’.

src_text: in the wake of the tragedy, the community has pointed out that there are no viable sports grounds, community libraries or youth centres in scenery park.
tgt_text: nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi hu tshi kha ḓi bva u bvelela tshiwo itshi tsha makhaulambilu ngaurali, vhadzulapo vho sumbedza uri a hu na midavhi yavhuḓi ya zwa mitambo, ḽaiburari dza zwitshavha kana senthara dza vhaswa afho scenery park.

src_text: as government at national, provincial and local level we need to respond to the pleas of this community and those of other communities by developing more recreational spaces, facilities, programmes, and projects for our young people in disadvantaged areas in the province.
tgt_text: sa muvhuso wa lushaka, wa vunḓu na muvhuso wapo, ri khou tea u vha na zwine ra ita nga ha hedzi khumbelo dza tshitshavha hetshi khathihi na dziṅwe dza zwiṅwe zwitshavha nga u fhaṱa fhethu hunzhi ha zwa vhuḓimvumvusi, tshomedzo, mbekanyamushumo na thandela ri tshi itela vhaswa vhashu vha re kha vhupo hu shayaho kha vunḓu.

src_text: other social partners such as the business community should also assist with sponsorship.
tgt_text: vhaṅwe vhashumisani vhashu kha zwa matshilisano u fana na vha tshitshavha tsha zwa mabindu na vhone vha tea u thusa nga ndambedzo.

src_text: as communities we must work with our community policing forums, with our civics organisations and with our school governing bodies and play a more active role in the lives of our children and in ensuring their safety and wellbeing.
tgt_text: sa vhadzulapo ri tea u shumisana na foramu dza zwa vhupholisa ha tshitshavha, madzangano ashu a vhadzulapo khathihi na vha khorombusi dza zwikolo zwashu u itela uri ri kone u shela mulenzhe nga nḓila yo fhelelaho kha matshilo a vhana vhashu khathihi na u vhona uri vho tsireledzea na u ṱhogomelwa.

src_text: as they say in our african indigenous classics "it takes a community to raise a child".
tgt_text: sa zwine zwa ambiswa zwone kha nyambo dzashu dzapo dza afrika, "u alusa ṅwana ndi vhuḓifhinduleli ha tshitshavha tshoṱhe".

src_text: let us work together to protect our precious future generation from the ravages of alcohol and drug abuse and their effects.
tgt_text: kha ri shumisane u itela u tsireledza mirafho yashu i ḓaho ya manakanaka kha tshinyalelo i vhangwaho nga mahalwa khathihi na u shumiswa ha zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila yo kalulaho hu tshi katelwa na masiandaitwa azwo.

src_text: let us work together to ensure that those who put profit before the lives of our children are not allowed to operate.
tgt_text: kha ri shumisane u itela u vhona uri avho vhane vha rangisa mbuelo ya masheleni phanḓa u fhirisa matshilo a vhana vhashu a vha khou tendelwa u bvela phanḓa na ayo mabindu avho nga nḓila yeneyo.

src_text: let us also set a positive example in our own relationship with alcohol.
tgt_text: kha ri dovhe hafhu ri vhe tsumbo yavhuḓi kha vhushaka hashu na zwikambi.

src_text: let us be keepers of not just our own children, but our neighbours’ children as well.
tgt_text: shango ḽashu ḽi kha ḓi vha kha malilo a u lilela matshilo a vhaswa vhe vha lovha kha tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela fhaḽa thaveni ya enyobeni vukuzenzele unnamed vhege dzi si gathi dzo fhiraho miṱa ya vhupo ha tshikolobulasi tsha fhaḽa scenery park hune ha vha nnḓa nyana ha ḓorobo ya east london, yo ṱanganedza ma fhungo ane mubebi muṅwe na muṅwe a dzulela u a ra belisa uri ngavhe a sa swiki hune a nga a pfa.
